name: Bombardier
description: Bombardier is a quick and chaotic online multiplayer game which supports up to 8 players in an arena, or play locally with up to 4 of your closest friends and battle to be crowned the ultimate Bombardier!

name: Blood Bound Origins
description: Bloodbound Origins is a VIP-exclusive short form special of the Bloodbound series.

name: The Legend of the Blue Sword
description: The evil necromancer has taken over the Castle. As the heroic warrior of this land, it is your task to slay this foul sorcerer and banish him from this realm once and for all.

name: Turnabout Train Or Shine
description: The familiar case is presented in a new, more rational and grounded, but also more wholesome and satisfying way. Using the simplistic but enjoyable Ace Attorney mechanics, approaching the same case from different angles, this will be an enjoyable experience for those that know the case very well and cannot get over it.

name: With Love Comes Regret
description: A psychological horror girls love visual novel about two girls bonding over their overbearing parents and trying to live freely. But one of the girls seems to be haunted by the ghost of her own mother.

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers Collection
description:
Nickelodeon Kart Racers Collection is a Nickelodeon crossover video game box set released for the Nintendo Switch

3 Games include
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway

name: Pogo Arc
description: Bounce around a circular arena

name: Knights & Guns: Gold Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #1 and Armor Pack #1.

name: Detail Detective
description: Can you spot all differences and conquer the world of details?

name: Dungeons and Goblins
description: Small Hero, Big Adventures - Craft Your Destiny!

name: Cooking Arena: 6 in 1 Edition
description: This bundle contains "Food Truck Tycoon", "Sweet Bakery Tycoon", "Food Truck Tycoon - Asian Cuisine", "Burger Chef Tycoon", "Breakfast Bar Tycoon" and "Pizza Bar Tycoon".

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Variety Pack 22
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: It Happened Here: Beacon of Truth - Collector's Edition
description: Dive into a cold case of murder and betrayal at a lighthouse!

name: Crash Metal: Cyber Racing Punk Cars
description: Sin descripción

name: Park Racer
description: Take control of cute tiny cars, collect coins to unlock new cars and drive your car to victory in this stylish racing game taking place in amusement parks. Drift, slid, skid your bolide to victory in races of 6, competing against skilled bots.

name: LightBear
description: Play the indie, roguelike, fat bear game. Journey from the center of the maze to your freedom! Every death will only send you back. Can you escape the clutches of the Golden Apiary?

name: Foot Clinic: Smelly feet
description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Perfume premium tool
- Tweezers Pro skin
- Pedicure Pliers Pro skin
- Toenail Clippers Pro skin
- 2000 coins to upgrade your clinic faster

name: Foot Clinic: Feet the fish
description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Fish tank tool
- Soap and flusher Pro skin
- Foot Care Cream Pro skin
- Thorn Tweezers Pro skin
- 2000 coins to upgrade your clinic faster

name: Food Truck Tycoon: GOTY Edition
description:
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Urban Flow: Elite Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Winter Expansion Pack and Streets Supplement with:
• 7 new vehicles
• 20 new levels!
• winter theme and new music!

name: Foot Clinic
description:
Step into the shoes of a doctor and podiatrist as you indulge in the foot clinic experience. Scrub, scrape, pluck, and pull all kinds of feet.

Perform foot treatments for conditions like calluses, corns and ingrown toenails. Each patient presents a new problem, so you'll never get bored of your work!

name: Love Kuesuto
description: Take on the role of an old man whose life is flashing before his eyes. As you awaken, the goddess Aphrodite guides you through four game boards full of romantic trauma and relationship dilemmas.

name: Digitris
description: In the best tradition of the worlwide known Russian puzzle game, Digitris will test your agility and dexterity. Align digits so their sum equals a target sum that increases at each level, making the game increasingly difficult.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Club Crazy
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Party down with these Night Club themed tables!

name: Turbo-Trex By Orazio Cacciola
description:
Mom Trex has to go and save her little one, kidnapped by his archenemy who wants revenge after the last lost battle. You will have to cross the desert plain, full of angry Pterodactyls, who do not hesitate to jump on you. After that, she will have to go through the big forest, where the Swift Raptors will be waiting for her, they also hate the Trex. She and finally she will have to go through the valley of volcanoes and she will have to be very careful of the fireballs raining down from the sky. At the end of this long journey, you will arrive in the home of the enemy, a large carnivore, where you will face the fight to the death.

Our Trex will have to avoid all the obstacles that she will find on the way throughout the journey. She will have the ability to defend herself against enemies by spitting a flame of fire from her mouth, which range will be short range, so she will have to throw it when the enemy is close. The more enemies she knocks down, the more energy she will accumulate to be able to last longer in the final battle.

name: Ancient Mahjong
description: Mahjong is the world famous Asian solitaire game to be played casually. In this simple yet very effective version, you will have to match 2 tiles at a time with same figures.

name: Fire Water Green
description: This is a 30-second survival shooting game. You shoot with the mouse for direction and move your ship with WASD. There are 3 attributes: fire, water and green, and 3-way deadlock.

name: Soul's Spectrum: Awakening
description: You wake up in a mysterious dungeon, full of dangerous traps and unlucky inhabitants. Brain cracking puzzles await you while a dark story will slowly unfold in this supernatural place!

name: Noah's Descent into Madness
description: Noah's Descent into Madness is a short horror-themed adventure and puzzle game. Make your way through a dark forest of unknown horrors while trying your best to escape the nightmare you've found yourself in.

name: Island Clash
description: Island Clash is an adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced first-person shooter game! Unlock brand new weapons every time you eliminate enemies, with no ammunition limits, delivering a completely different shooting experience! Are you ready to take on the hail of bullets?

name: Hundred
description: Let's set up our items and defeat monsters!!! Sorry, that's all there is!!!

name: Slow Rise
description: A small adventure.The road ahead is difficult, moving and jumping.Carefully reach the finish line.Once you make a mistake, go back to the starting point.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 3
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L.
description: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L. It is a multiplayer TPS game with fantastic and colorful graphics, developed by a small team. Fight across multiple game modes and ever-growing maps. Take to the Field, Fight and Survive!

name: Tank War Shooting Simulator
description: Experience the excitement of tank wars with the Tank War Shooting Simulator! Feel like a tank driver with realistic graphics and various game modes.

name: Office Life
description: "Office Life" is a visual novel for adults only. A young IT specialist Jake is looking for a job and gets a good offer. His boss turns out to be a hot and seductive woman. He strives to conquer her using different methods, even the most daring ones.

name: Last Minute
description: Last Minute is a first person horrorgame.

name: Garnouille Must Live!
description: Help Garnouille. In a magical world full of dangers, Garnouille, an intrepid frog, embarks on a quest to save his habitat from imminent destruction. To do this, Garnouille must navigate through levels riddled with deadly traps using his special “dash” ability.

name: Halloween Games for Toddlers and Kids
description: A lovingly designed Halloween puzzle learning game for small preschool children. It contains an animal memory find the pairs game that you can play against a cat as your opponent. For fearless children or you have your diaper ready!

name: KimodameshiGolf
description: Kimodameshi Golf is a horror golf game based on golf!

name: Bad Dreams: Free Dive
description: Bad Dreams is a Solo VR Horror game with immersive gameplay based on real gesture. A unique experience, where nightmares become reality.Fight, Run, Jump, Wipe your eyes, Cover your ears... while avoiding the game's traps and puzzles, you won't come out unscathed!

name: Meurtre Au Florian
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Meurtre Au Florian! This game features real actors bringing captivating characters to life. This innovative experience transports you into the mysterious world of an enigmatic murder.

name: Games for Stream!
description: An exhilarating chat interactive game, where the chat becomes your co-pilot, shaping the course of the game in real-time. Engage with your favorite streamers and viewers like never before as you type commands, make choices, and influence the game's outcomes directly through chat.

name: Legendary Slide 2: Platinum Edition
description: Clear away the tiles, solve over 80 unique Mahjong puzzles and collect gems to restore ancient temple of Air and continue your journey through the Legendary world of Legendary Slide II.

name: Game Collector
description: Embark on an exciting journey to become the ultimate game collector in this simulation and resource management adventure! Beat minigames for money, relax by playing your games, and focus on balancing money and fun. Begin your journey to become a legendary game collector!

name: JJJ
description: "A normal vacation" the three friends were thinking, when they were drawn into a macabre ending.

name: Morph Animals
description: Morph into creatures, conquer Morph Animals World, and let the adventure begin!

name: Dung Beetle Adventure
description: A short (and free) adventure game, where you are tasked with helping a hurt, hungry, but inventive dung beetle on its journey to find something to eat near the end of the mushroom season.

name: Full Moon
description: An adventure in werewolf hunting, for witches.

name: Furry Love
description: Furry Love - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful ladies.

name: Net Defender
description: Net Defender, a VR game where you play as a goalkeeper. With realistic physics, graphics, and immersive sound, experience the thrill of being on the pitch and improve your reflexes while having fun

name: Mindfield
description: Experience the powerful VR short film, Mindfield, delving deep into the world of PTSD. Immerse yourself in this thought-provoking journey and witness the invisible scars of war in a whole new way.

name: Rhythm Master
description: ‘Rhythm Master’ is a new concept rhythm game in which each stage proceeds in a battle format based on a story. Collect various characters and strategize using their unique abilities to fight against various enemies.

name: Claire's Cruisin' Cafe: Fest Frenzy
description: Join Claire as she embarks on a journey of culinary discovery! It's the first day of the festival, and she needs your help to run her food truck successfully. You'll need to swiftly take orders, cook up delicious dishes, and serve them with a smile.

name: Akpala
description: Dive into an action-packed VR game featuring magical battles! Experience authentic spellcasting with a voice recognition system that activates magic as you chant. Swing your arms and pose to amplify your spells, offering a thrilling, immersive magical experience.

name: Minute
description: A 3D action platformer where you play as a wind-up toy in a Tinkerer's workshop set in the Victorian Age. As a small wind-up toy, you must rely on your wind-up key to embark on an arduous journey. Defeat enemies and uncover a dark secret within the rooms.

name: Myriad Hotel
description: A silly hotel-management visual novel. Impress clients, earn money, and resolve issues for your staff to keep the hotel from going under.

name: Tank Battle Resist
description: In the face of a large number of fierce enemy steel torrents, the real warrior is not afraid of danger. Come on, let's defeat the enemy and protect our camp together.

name: What The Gravity
description: Prepare for the electrifying space adventure as a delivery specialist in the legendary United Space Force (USF). Embark on a high-octane delivery run, navigating treacherous space battlefields, and defying all odds to ensure the success of your critical mission - before the beer gets warm.

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Humanity's Last Hope
description: It is a game created for the SNV community to recreate the most epic battles in anime.

name: Black Smith 4
description: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

name: Scary Maze Game
description: You and up to 5 friends need to find the exit of a maze, beware of the monster that lurks in the shadows.

name: Cypher 007
description: Cypher 007 is a top-down mobile action game published by Tilting Point. Inspired by 60 years of Spycraft and Cypher 007, players will experience the world of Agent 007 to revisit Bond's most iconic moments and locations. Players are tasked with defeating criminal mastermind Blofeld, head of Spectre, by gathering intel, uncovering secrets, and overcoming immersive levels filled with obstacles, opponents, and objectives that increase in difficulty as they progress. Compete against other 007 agents worldwide via leaderboards to prove who is on top. Cypher 007 is launching into Apple Arcade on September 29.

name: No Logic
description: No Logic is a puzzle platform game where you have to disable your logic in order to complete this game!

name: You're Not Family
description: A (really short) free narrative rhythm game by Atiya Nova. Attend a family dinner and time your key presses to the flow of conversation. Features lots of familial tension with a dash of misery. And cute bunnies!

name: Gordy and the Monster Moon
description: Gordy and the Monster Moon is a bite-sized exploration-driven game about a pumpkin astronaut going on spooky adventures.

name: Backrooms: Run For Your Life!
description: This is a Backrooms game created by fans. In this game, the main experience is the "Level!" in Backroom(or "Run For Your Life").

name: Velocity Valley
description: Race up to 8 players for the fastest lap in 7 minutes. Manage tire wear (soft, medium, hard). Completing 8 laps earns players a coin bonus to unlock new tracks. Violations such as going on the grass, crashing, or multiple cars in the pitlane incur a 3-second penalty.

name: RPG Bundle
description: Teleport to fantasy world and defeat monsters to become the best fighter!

name: From the Deep
description: A warrior finds himself on the darkest of the dungeons. He does not know how or why he came to be there. He does not know how to get out of it. To conquer his freedom, he will have his fears challenged, his will tested, and his courage tried.

name: Zakantosh Cardgame
description: A Collectible Single Player Card Battle Game that focuses on Story Content. Your enemies are all kind of creatures, goaded by the evil influence of the mysterious crystals, that appeared out of nowhere. You will need to collect powerful cards and gems to fight your way through Zakantosh.

name: Park Beyond: Beyond Extreme
description: In Park Beyond players can create the park of their dreams, without being held back by gravity! As the newly-hired visionary architect for a struggling company, players will be able to create mind-twisting theme parks. Players can create rides they have always dreamt about but that couldn’t exist in real life. Along with Phil, the enthusiastic park veteran and Izzy, the stern but friendly executive and a host of other colorful and passionate characters, players will pave the way to a successful and profitable park company. Thanks to accessible controls and a story-driven campaign mode, players will get to learn the ropes of park management and build increasingly crazy rides and modular coasters.

name: V Gate
description: V gate; It is an open world game that includes first and third person shooter, survival, exploration, crafting, horror, thriller, team, building, mystery, management concepts and drags you towards different worlds with explorations.

name: Alvara
description:
Forge your destiny!
Every choice shapes the adventure in this turn-based narrative RPG. Forge strong relationships, influence the story and recruit allies whose power depends on their affections. Craft, potion, explore, dominate. Alvara: Choices and alliances chart your course!

name: Savant: Ascent Remix
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-filled elevator ride through a robot-infested tower. Wield powerful magic, and acrobatic moves as you reclaim the Alchemist's domain from a horde of mechanical fiends.

name: Prison Colony: A Convict's Tale
description: Fight enemy vehicles on a procedurally generated, foreign world in this 3D Mecha game. Build better vehicles until you can afford your own spacejet, and escape the prison colony using that spacejet. Defend your base from enemy attack or pick the next mission to play.

name: The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary
description: Adam wakes up trapped in his apartment building, where darkness and strange visions abound. To unravel the mystery and escape, he must find missing diary pages, embarking on a heart-pumping First Person Visual Novel Adventure in 'The Midnight Town Stories: Adam's Diary.

name: Void Survivors
description: Void Survivors is a fast-paced action roguelike game where you have to survive relentless hordes of monsters for 20 minutes!

name: Hidden Nightmares
description: Hidden Nightmares is a horror experience set inside the endless nightmares of a psychiatric patient. Experience the horrors generated by the human mind and wonder if you will ever wake up again.

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
In this set:
- The main game
- Digital Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Season Pass (featuring 3 Additional Episodes)
- Season Pass Bonus: Hallowed Relic Sword Mountings (Equipment)

name: Office Is My Harem
description: After being unreasonably criticised by your manager, you decided to fight back. Unexpectedly, this attracted your female colleagues. Could it be that a chance to fulfill your fantasy of having a workplace harem? This visual novel game has a readily story rhythm and lots of erotic scenes.

name: The Knight's Path
description: This game is an invitation to challenge a hero to become what the princess has been waiting for. Solve several ancient puzzles based on the classic Peg Solitaire game to reach the princess in a remote castle. Will you be the champion?

name: Commander: Zombie Wars
description: Embark on a gripping turn-based tactical game in a zombie-infested world. Choose survivors or zombies. Gather resources, recruit allies, and strategize against the undead or join the undead. Shape custom maps, and decide the fate of the world. Join the fight now!

name: Ia Scatter City
description: Ia Scatter City is a level made with unreal engine and the "ia scatter" add-on where you can fly through a small part of a sci-fi city.

name: Conquistadorio
description: The conquistador, who has faced many trials in his life, decided to retire and become a hermit. Just lying in his solitary cave away from people. But it seems that fate itself throws new challenges at you even in such a simple matter.

name: Super Buff HD
description: Super Buff HD is a fast-paced skate-surf-FPS. Dash, bounce, grind, blast, shred, shoot, and soar through a fever dream world of unhinged weirdness. Defeat all the buff dudes. Get a high score. Be a winner. Home for dinner.

name: EA Sports FC 24
description: EA SPORTS FC 24 is the ultimate football simulation game that lets you play as your favourite stars and teams in the most authentic and immersive way possible. With EA SPORTS FC, you can experience the thrill of the world's biggest competitions, such as the Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Women's Champions League, La Liga Santander, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Serie A, CONMEBOL Libertadores, Barclays Women's Super League, NWSL and many more. EA SPORTS FC 24 also features a new brand identity inspired by the triangles that have been part of EA SPORTS football for the past 30 years, from the isometric polygons that make up the game to the chemistry triangles that exist in Ultimate Team to the player indicator across every match. Join the Club and be part of a new Football Club for the future of football we want to build together.

name: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin!
description: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin! is an upcoming side story of the Neko-nin ExHeart series.

name: Simply Cubic
description: Draw a route to where you want to the black cube to go. Take care to draw by anticipating what may happen after starting the route. Remember, your right to draw a route is limited. Make good use of these rights!

name: Queen of Moths
description: It's a winter night. You are coming home by train. You have to change trains at a small train station in the middle of the forest.It's not the first time you've traveled this route. But now you feel like something is different.As if something was watching you.

name: Mother Ghoul: The Curse of Unborns
description: The next victim is you. Mother Ghoul is a horror and thriller game where you try to survive against a cursed ghost that you have been offered as a sacrifice. To break free from the curse, you must find and destroy her stillborn children through a ritual. This is the only way...

name: Protolife: Other Side
description: Reverse Tower Defense game where you control waves of creatures against towers. Protolife game spin-off.

name: Hat'venture
description: Jumping into a hole may not be the best idea, but your hair has been stolen. Master the powers of hats and get it back.

name: Ninja Kidz: Time Masters
description: America's most popular online ninja family's first video game is here! Ninja Kidz: Time Masters is a colourful action adventure for the whole family where you can play alone or together with friends. Rescue the 3 greatest martial arts masters kidnapped by Dr. Disaster.

name: System Critical 2
description: System Critical 2 is bigger & badder than ever before! Get ready to experience a platformer shooter like no other in VR. Blast your arm cannon and use guns, melee weapons, grenades,& shields to make your way through the carefully crafted levels with epic boss battles and tons of enemies to kill.

name: After Dark
description: An Indie arcade take on the zombie wave survival genre with boss fights and unique mechanics. You are not expected to survive.

name: GeoJelly
description: Born within unknown you instinctively seek for freedom as an experiment defect. In GeoJelly you have to find your way out of dystopian laboratory through platforming while avoiding traps and collecting keys necessary to push forward. Are you gonna find a way out?

name: Tiny Atolls
description: Tiny Atolls is a minimalist building strategy game. Build bridges across colorful islands, unlock new tiles, and complete quests to expand your world!

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant
description:
Throughout the Fate franchise, pairs of masters and heroic spirits —also known as servants— have been fighting across history in a series of Holy Grail Wars, with the winning duo receiving an ancient artifact that grants wishes.

Fate/Samurai Remnant continues the series’ epic Holy Grail War in the fourth year of the Keian Era, Edo Period Japan. It has been several decades since the end of a turbulent, blood-soaked era, and while the people are finally enjoying peace and tranquility, a battle between seven pairs of masters and servants is about to begin as the “Waxing Moon Ritual” unfolds in the shadows. This is where the game’s hero, Miyamoto Iori, a young man in Asakusa, finds himself caught in the violence alongside his servant Saber, as they fight to be the last pair remaining in order to receive the granter of wishes, the “Waxing Moon Vessel”.

name: Shape Shifter: Formations
description: Shape Shifter: Formations is an action twin-stick shooter with rogue-lite elements, where you must destroy hordes of geometric enemies alone or with a friend. Select your ship and combine a large variety of weapons, abilities and infinitely stacking upgrades to craft your own unique build.

name: Limerick: Cadence Mansion
description: Limerick: Cadence Mansion is a detail-rich first-person thriller-adventure with deep lore, intricate puzzles, satisfying stealth-action gameplay, and a happy little marionette who really wants to say "hello."

name: Betrix
description: Rhythm Tetris - fusing Tetris with Music. Tap rhythm with harddrop, and feel melody with stack. Create your own level and share it with other Players.

name: Lost Paws
description: Survive as a stray dog in a large open world. Scavenge, craft, trade, and steal your way into a world where all the pets disappear. Arm yourself and take to the streets to rise from homeless to well-off no matter what it takes. What kind of story will you tell?

name: Cocoon
description: Cocoon is a unique take on the puzzle adventure genre, where each world exists within an orb that you can carry on your back. Wrap your head around the core mechanic of leaping between worlds—and combine, manipulate, and rearrange them to solve intricate puzzles

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York & Shadows of New York: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following;

+ Vampire - The Mascarade: Coteries of New York (the game)
+ Vampire - The Mascarade: Shadows of New York (the game)
+ The art book
+ The original sound track in vinyl format

name: Saleblazers
description: Embark on an epic adventure across the lands as a humble shopkeeper. Build your shop exactly the way you want it, sell goods from your travels, and defend your base from nightly horrors in this open world shopkeeping RPG for 1-8 players!

name: Islands of the Caliph
description: Islands of the Caliph is an old-school RPG with grid based movement set in a fictional island civilization. Thematically it draws on Middle Eastern folklore and religion, offering a lore-rich setting for your character's journey.

name: Mac's Journal
description: Explore environments full of secrets and meet quirky characters in this short rpg. Collect items, use them in battle and to get access to different places. And most importantly, help Mac in his adventure to save a puppy from some evil oranges!

name: Torn Away
description: See the tragedy of World War 2 through the eyes of a child. Torn away from your home, you become a worker in a forced labor camp. You have to survive without losing what makes us human in this war-torn world, where only the strongest prevail.

name: Definitely Not Fried Chicken
description:
A business management sim with a twist, players will grow their drug trade empire through ‘legitimate’ fronts by managing both sides of the business. One uses the front door, another uses the back! Acquire new ‘businesses’, meet new clientele, develop more potent narcotics, make lots of money, and leave a city in ruin!

Set in a sunshine soaked city in the glamorous '80s, Definitely Not Fried Chicken is the ultimate test of your entrepreneurial business skills.

Build your drugs compound from the ground up, buy adjoining plots of land and expand. Design and lay out your complete production line and establish distribution routes. Fortify your compound’s defences and make sure any ‘overly-enthusiastic’ customers can't break in. Research and develop better strains of narcotics like marijuana, cocaine, and methamphetamine.

name: Miss Perfect Miss Ending
description: Miss Perfect Miss Ending is a detective game where you talk to Pretty, solving puzzles, finding secrets and unlock numerous endings!

name: Midnight Crimes
description: It is 1933 and prohibition is about to end. Organized crime syndicates are flooding the black market with their product and it is making them exorbitant profits one last time. At the very same moment Eliot Ness and his Untouchables find themselves in a battle of survival in the city. You are one of these untouchables and you have to get to the criminals before they get to you. So strap on both your holsters because you're shooting it out every night.

name: Tower of Delight
description: Sin descripción

name: Eggconsole Relics PC-8801
description:
This is an action-adventure game released by Bothtec in 1986. The main character is drifting as a spirit in the ruins that suddenly appear from under the sea. There is no explanation as to why he has become a spirit or what he has to do, but by exploring the ruins, the situation becomes dimly apparent.

One of the highlights of this game is the spirit ride system, in which the player possesses a defeated opponent. The attack methods and durability vary depending on the possessed body, so the key to the strategy is which creature you possess as you continue your search. In addition, the items that can be obtained change depending on the player's actions, and the storyline and ending change, so it is up to the player to decide how to proceed with the exploration of the ruins. The ability to experiment with this and that is a unique aspect of this game.

The cinematic elements of the game, such as the rich sci-fi character designs, the profound movements of the humanoid characters, and the effective sound of the waves, will add to the excitement of the game. The opening and ending music was composed by Crystal King, which was a big hit at the time.

name: Super Mario and the Monstrous Manor
description:
Mario gets invited to explore a haunted manor in this unconventionally-structured major hack.

Solve puzzles, collect keys, and fight enemies to uncover the mystery of the manor

name: Takua 64
description:
Takua 64 is a major total conversion mod for Super Mario 64 created by Superstupidy to bring the world of Bionicle into the N64 3D platforming era!

With environment and level design inspired by games like Metroid Prime, Tomb Raider, and of course, the many Bionicle games that had a huge influence on this game’s world.
MNOG,
MNOGII,
Bionicle the Game,
The Legend of Mata Nui,
and Tales of the Tohunga,
being primary examples.

With 99 “Toa Stones” to find and collect, Takua 64 is a very large romhack feturing 12 levels, each with multiple areas to explore and challenges to overcome.

name: Parasite Flower
description:
A short disturbing horror game where you're playing as Ari Yeong, she is re-living the same day over and over again . With each loop the world around her get's darker and more dangerous.

Get her to school safely.

name: Resident Evil: Containment
description:
Resident Evil - Containment, is a new stand alone total conversion mod for the original 1996 release of Resident Evil. It follows the story of Ghost, a member of the Umbrella Security Service, who were sent into the Arklay Research Facility to investigate a distress call. This mod takes place shortly before the events of Resident Evil 0 and Resident Evil.

The mod features a whole new story that loosely fits within the original Resident Evil time-line as well as many brand new locations, some of these new locations are based off the scrapped prototype concept art for Resident Evil and others are all brand new original creations. It also contains new cutscenes, new puzzles, new events, new music, new sounds, new FMV movies and also new gameplay features never before seen in Resident Evil!

Experience the world of survival horror one more time in this brand new, complete, stand-alone, total conversion mod for Resident Evil!

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Hookhausen: Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack
description: Expand your AEW playable roster with Hook and his ally Danhausen.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Maimai DX + Ongeki Pack
description:
A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "maimai DX" and "Ongeki"!
A DLC pack for Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "maimai DX" and "Ongeki"!

name: Ufight
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil: Containment
description:
Spread across five episodes, Resident Evil: Containment is a still in progress overhaul mod based on the Windows PC Version of Resident Evil (1996).

It is a prequel story set during the first days of the Arklay Mansion outbreak, and detail USS Agent Ghost's investigation into the outbreak alongside his partner HUNK. The mod features new mechanics including human enemies and stealth mechanics, in addition to entirely new environments based on cut concepts from the original game.

name: Easy Japanesey 2
description: The easy way to boost your Japanese language skills!

name: Easy Japanesey
description: The easy way to boost your Japanese language skills!

name: Easy Japanesey 3
description: The easy way to boost your Japanese language skills!

name: Hidden Gems: Volume One
description: 4 forgotten classics from the 1980s, originally published for the Commodore 64, are resurrected in this exciting collection.

name: Night of Full Moon: Wolf - Mirror
description: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her memories...

name: Night of Full Moon: Witch - Wishing
description: When the priest is defeated by Little Red Riding Hood, the witch discovers many ancient and mysterious magic books in the priest's hut. Out of her search for the truth of magic, she spent her days engrossed in reading those ancient tomes.

name: Night of Full Moon: Witcher - Mirror
description: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her memories...

name: Night of Full Moon: Little Pig Monster - Crossover
description: Addition of a limited-time crossover mode, Little Pig Monster will be online soon, with 83 new cards and 18 new monsters. Tailored gameplay, original storyline, let's come to the world of Little Pig Monster and recall those touching moments ......

name: Night of Full Moon: Echoes of Nature - Classic
description: From an early age, Little Red Riding Hood demonstrates her unique talent, the ability to communicate with spirits. In order to avoid the church, her grandmother took her to settle in a remote cottage, however, escaping did not stop the church messengers.

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2
• Season Pass
• Season Pass 2
• In-game item: Ribbit Ribbit Set

MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2, the over-the-top follow-up to the smash hit 3D arena fighter MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE, makes its heroic debut! Make full use of characters' Quirks as you clash head-to-head in epic battles across huge arenas!

name: The Sims 4: Home Chef Hustle Stuff Pack
description: Grow your culinary skills with new small appliances and turn cooking into cash with The Sims 4 Home Chef Hustle Stuff Pack.

name: Arcade Archives: Finest Hour
description:
Pilot the newest robot "Sygnus" and reach the goal in time.

Use the three buttons, Vernier (jump), Marker, and Shot to run through the stage and defeat enemies.

name: The Museum of Mid 2000s Forum Signatures
description: Inside this humble museum dedicated to media left behind, you will find 15 pieces on display. The museum should take between 5 and 10 minutes to browse!

name: Tribe Dash: Scout's Pack
description: Dive deeper into Tribe Dash with 1700 coins and boosters! Lead your tribe to legendary heights in the Stone Age saga!

name: Persona 3 Portable: S.E.E.S Edition
description:
Persona 3 Portable S.E.E.S Edition includes:

- Physical Copy of Persona 3 Portable
- Persona 3 Portable Slipcover
- 1:1 Evoker Replica Shadowbox - Lights Up (Evoker Replica is non-removable)
- All Out Attack 3D Shadow Box
- Persona 3 Portable Official Soundtrack
- Grimoire Book Box
- Character Trading Cards
- School Patch
- S.E.E.S. Armband
- SteelBook
- Certificate of Authenticity - Individually Numbered

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Halara: Raining Cats & Dog
description: The third DLC for Master Detective Archives: Rain Code is a substory that features protagonist Halara Nightmare, and allows players to control the Master Detective with the Forensic Forte "Postcognition."

name: CounterAttack: Uprising
description: CO-OP SHMUP / STG (Shoot em' up), 4 player local and 8 player online. Customize your ship with over 500 attachments while you blast through 32 levels.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Pirate Fleets
description: On the high seas, smugglers and buccaneers fight for treasure and glory. Life is cheap, and rum is even cheaper. Landlubbers in port towns dread the day that black sails appear on the horizon.

name: Joe Biden For The PS2 2: Re-elected
description: A mod for Super Mario World.

name: Angel Whisper: The Suspense Visual Novel Left Behind by a Game Creator.
description:
This is the last work of a certain game creator who mysteriously disappeared. The cross reality ADV, known for its shocking conclusion.
"Angel Whisper", released by Child-Dream in 1999, became a major topic of conversation with its system of playing the posthumous game while browsing actual websites, raising the question, "Did this really happen?".

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Overbearing and Preppy Girl Maid GP-01
description: "Preppy Girl Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "Custom Order Maid 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01."[Empire Life Mode]

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Overbearing and Preppy Girl Maid GP-01fb
description: "Preppy Girl Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "Custom Order Maid 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01fb." The following 2 events have been added. ・Sexy love date play ・Happy happy morning!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Overbearing and Preppy Girl Maid GP-02
description: "Preppy Girl Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "Custom Order Maid 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP02."

name: Encore Rally
description: Survive against the RALLY of aliens. Need an ENCORE?

name: Tiny Whaley
description: Embark on an exciting 2D adventure under the ocean! In this puzzle-heavy game, where we manage a magical and unusual whale, we not only overcome obstacles by jumping, but also create our own path by positioning your dead bodies at the right points.

name: Everhood: Eternity Edition
description: Welcome to an inexpressible world filled with a deep story, humor, amusing musical battles and strange delightful encounters. This is the best console version of the adventure RPG indie hit, including 16 exclusive new musical battles composed by some of the most renowned artists in the indie scene and designed by members of the community. Expect the unexpected!

name: Kumakichi's Birth: Destruction God
description:
Break it!
Break it! !
Break it! ! !

name: Art Heist: Escape Room Adventure
description: An escape room inspired adventure. A stormy night, a secluded villa. A precious artwork has been stolen during a heist. Will you track down the missing painting before the culprit escapes?

name: Dog Years
description: Intrepid explorers embark on a perilous space expedition to save their dying civilization by securing vital resources. They are accompanied by 5P4RKY, an android dog, but trouble ensues as the journey begins.

name: Welcome Teacher
description: This is a horror RPG Maker MV game. Explore the quiet countryside shrouded in darkness, and uncover the hidden secret of terror that lies behind it.

name: Moonring
description: A dark fantasy, turn-based, retro-fusion of classic turn-based RPGs and roguelikes, all presented with a unique neon aesthetic.

name: Matrix Bullet
description: This is a cyber 2D bullet-plume dodging game in which players aim to clear the screen by continuously dodging the oncoming bullets.

name: Black Runes
description: Black Runes is a horror game with first-person puzzle elements, in which you have to play as a person caught in a hopeless situation, shrouded in magic.

name: The Ghosts of Terinor
description: The Ghosts of Terinor have recently gained the ability to drain magical powers. As expected your ability to throw fireballs was confiscated by them almost immediately. Use your dual enchanted blades to regain your mojo!

name: Something In The Well
description: Something stirs in the backwoods of Montana. You can hear it trying to get in. All you have is your trusty dog and a camcorder. A short 5-10 minute game with 2 endings.

name: Keali
description: The other guardian spirits have gone missing, and now the timid Keali must traverse down into the forest temple to find them. Using your tether and other movement abilities to traverse past the creeping vines and what was long ago imprisoned there.

name: Last Stand
description: Future Agent Natasha finally found the recently awakened human hero, Morgen. This time, they must embark on a perilous journey back to the South Pole, seeking the origins of the impending world apocalypse. However, what awaits them there is a group of unknown enemies shrouded in mystery

name: Dreams: Unlimited links
description: 《Dreams: Unlimited links》 is a third-person shooter competitive game that features a variety of unique heroes, exciting gameplay modes, and rich scene maps and battlegrounds. Players can venture alone or team up for thrilling multiplayer battles, challenging other teams.

name: Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room
description: Grandpa is still missing and as you dive deeper into the investigation, everything becomes stranger and more enigmatic. The adventure of puzzles and mysteries continues with Beach Café III: The Escape Room. Investigate, discover all the clues and interpret them properly in order to advance.

name: Anime Poly Puzzle: Sci-Fi Maidens
description: Anime Poly Puzzle: Sci-Fi Maidens is an exciting fusion of mind-bending low-poly puzzles and visually captivating anime girls set in a futuristic sci-fi environment.

name: Cropisle TD
description: After an earthquake, you're sent to an island for rebuilding. Face nightly critter attacks, set up towers, and farm. Your mission is to seal the island or secure crops before defenses are breached. Now, grab your shovel and hammer, and enter the defensive battle!

name: Vampires' Melody 2
description: Emerald seas! Blue skies! Sandy beaches! An island adventure in the ocean sounds like a trip to paradise. However, the place is a nightmare with no one to provide any blood for Raylan to feed on after he turned into a vampire by accident, especially since he has another hungry vampire at his side.

name: Chroma Wars
description: A retro, turn-based strategy game on a square-map where you engage in techno-fantasy warfare! Command magical armies, repel abyssal foes, and conquer the world in high-skill strategic battles.

name: Hentai Vivian
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Games Advent Calendar: 25 Days - 25 Surprises
description: In Games advent calendar, immerse yourself in that fantastic Christmas spirit, an exciting new game, every day for 25 days!

name: Overpass 2
description: Identify the best routes and balance of power, speed and precision to overcome obstacles at the controls of a UTV, ATV or Rock Bouncer. In both solo and multiplayer mode, your talent and choices of technique will make the difference.

name: ZomWick
description: Zomwick is a unique non-violent 3D tower defense game where the objective is to outlast enemies by using tactics and upgrades instead of using lethal brute force. It's addictive, challenging, and requires resourcefulness to survive.With free content updates, it's a must-play for TD fans.

name: Latmos Explorer
description: Discover the mysteries of Latmos with block coding. Learn about the cultural heritage and history of humanity while preparing for the future.

name: RPG Golf with Vampires
description: You are a vampire hunter. But also a golf ball. Put your way through increasingly difficult levels and hunt those pesky monsters with the help of in-game upgrades.

name: Sonic Frontiers: The Final Horizon
description: Rewrite your destiny in The Final Horizon Update! Experience a new story, new playable characters, new challenges, and more in Sonic Frontier’s 3rd climactic final Content Update… for Free!

name: Infinity Strash: Dragon Quest - The Adventure of Dai: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Legendary Mage - Popp Outfit
- Legendary Priest and Legendary Martial Artist - Maam Outfits
- Legendary Swordsman and Legendary Warrior - Hyunckel Outfits

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Boaty Tanks
description: Embark on an aquatic adventure! Control a small boat, armed with weapons, and navigate arenas. Battle enemy pool floats, test your skills, and immerse yourself in thrilling boat combat. Survive challenging fights and show off your shooting skills!

name: Fights in Tight Spaces: Weapon of Choice
description: Weapon of Choice is the first major content drop for Fights in Tight Spaces, and gives the player access to a new gun-fu inspired deck with 30+ new cards, new levels, music tracks, and a set of deadly new enemies.

name: Love in the Dark
description: In this multiplayer horror game, a loving couple receives an invitation from a wealthy man for an event. Despite my concerns, she insists on going. To protect her, I decide to secretly join and keep her safe.

name: Ys X: Nordics - Limited Edition
description:
The limited edition includes the following contents:
- A physical copy of Ys X: Nordics
- Ys X: Nordics Original Soundtrack mini
- Downloadable Content “Legendary Cleria Armor” for Adol Christin
- Ys X: Nordics original logo pin
- Ys X: Nordics visual card set
- Ys X: Nordics original crossbody sling bag (Adol Christin model)

Japanese release is handled by Falcom themselves, while Clouded Leopard handles the Chinese release and NIS America handles rest of the world.

name: Gothic Classic
description:
For the first time, relive this amazing RPG on a handheld console and enjoy the game that revolutionized roleplaying games on the go. Dive into dark times and adventures with great performance and a well adapted UI and controls.

War has been waged across the kingdom of Myrtana. Orcish hordes invaded human territory and the king of the land needed a lot of ore to forge enough weapons, should his army stand against this threat. Whoever breaks the law in these darkest of times is sentenced to serve in the giant penal colony of Khorinis, mining the so much needed ore. You are thrown through the barrier into this prison colony. With your back against the wall, you have to survive and form volatile alliances until you can finally escape.

name: Islanders: VR Edition
description:
Islanders is the critically acclaimed minimalist strategy game about building cities on colourful islands. Now coming to VR.

Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands, expand your settlements from sprawling villages to vast cities and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.

In Islanders: VR Edition, you begin with a blank canvas and a small set of minimalist buildings. Your goal is to populate and enrich each island with your creations, unlocking new buildings as you go by achieving a maximum score. Points are earned by carefully placing each building, being mindful of their surroundings like providing clear access to natural resources and making sure entry isn’t blocked.

When you’re ready, you can travel to a new land, exploring Islanders’ stunning new environments along the way, while building bigger, more expansive structures. The more you build, the higher your score will be and the grander city you’ll be able to gaze upon before starting all over again for just one more round.

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - The Dragon's Gambit
description: Brace yourself for 15 thrilling missions and find the valuable high-tier weapon cache in every mission. Introducing the Longbow fire-support 'Mech. Unlock Izanagi Warriors Variants as exclusive campaign rewards! New Instant Action Team Combat Mode, Garrisoned and Free For All.

name: Knockout Master
description: Knockout Master is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel that puts you in the role of a boxer, whose dream is to become the world's heavyweight champion. The game is packed with sex, romance, drama, and a rich story.

name: Schlag den Star: Das 3. Spiel
description: Fans of the popular TV show "Schlag den Star" can look forward to a new gaming experience: "Schlag den Star" is back in its third edition. The game promises even more fun, excitement and challenging games for all fans of the format.

name: Silent Hope: Wanderer's Weapon & Item Set
description: A DLC pack that unlocks an exclusive weapon for the Wanderer, a Magistone for increased stun resistance, consumables that boost experience gain and a ruby worth 5000 runes.

name: Silent Hope
description: Explore, fight, and produce items to grow stronger as seven distinct heroes in this silent world. Guided by the Princess, you'll delve into the Abyss and learn the mysteries of the King and his now-ruined kingdom. In a world without words, what hope is there for humanity?

name: The Cannon Fighters
description: The Cannon Fighters is an action game with fully destructible environments. Experience loads of fun alone or with friends! Randomly generated levels in various environments await you for even greater entertainment. Gain experience and show that you belong among the best!

name: Outta Hand
description:
Outta Hand is a high-energy platforming adventure that lets you embody one of the Hand-People, wide-eyed, hop-happy lab experiments with the power to jump great heights, leap impossible lengths, and shake hands from… really, really far away. Like a whole big dining room away.

Due to not being dumb enough, loveable as you are, Dr. Vendelvom has selected you for immediate termination. Not like fired gone, more like dead gone.

To save yourself and your brethren, you must platform, jump, bounce, and punch your way through the evil doctor’s laboratory with your… uh… very long arms, to take down him and all his baddies. With multiple levels and boss fights along with an endless mode, things might get, shall we say, a little bit “out of hand?” Get it?! No? Fine…

name: D or D
description: D or D is a psychological horror game that immerses you in daily experiences.One page in high school student Xiaoshan's notebook is written with some words starting with the letter "d"

name: Search All: UFO
description: Is a hidden object game in which you have to find all the flying saucers in a large area. The flying saucers will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places.

name: Freak Crossing
description: An accident makes you the temporary village head of a village of male thieves and female prostitutes...

name: Dolphin Spirit: Ocean Mission
description: Embark on an amazing adventure on the tropical island of Maupiroa! Take to the seas and discover the secrets that surround the island! Dive into the ocean's depths, teeming with life and color, with your dolphin friend Keanu.

name: The Bread Must Rise
description: The Great Godstone Bake-off has arrived! As a hapless baker deeply in debt, you finally have the opportunity to rise to fame and fortune! Under the tutelage of famous chefs , you will learn the arts of baking, breading, and dare you whisper it...necromancy?

name: The Paracelsian Project
description: You awaken in an unfamiliar location with unfamiliar people and are surrounded by mystery. Will you be able to solve the puzzle and uncover why you are here in this sci-fi/mystery/puzzle visual novel? The future hangs in the balance.

name: Randoville
description: Randoville is a medieval chill-builder where everything is decided by your luck! Will you get a shabby hut or a gorgeous palace? Throw D20 and find out!

name: Tribe Dash
description: Tribe Dash is a Stone Age time management simulator! Hunt, collect resources, and search for treasure on lost islands playing as the leader of a Stone Age tribe in this exciting adventure game!

name: Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu ha Kibou de Mawatteru!
description: Momotaro Dentetsu is a board game series that began in 1988 and will celebrate its 35th anniversary this year. Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu ha Kibou de Mawatteru! is a new take on the Momotaro Dentesu experience.

name: The VTuber Summit
description: Journey into a world featuring a miscellany of independent VTubers and creators, in this large-scale collaborative VTuber RPG! Fight your way to the Summit through a 100-battle gauntlet, in order to seize your dreams and become the new champion!

name: Biblios Dice
description: Biblios Dice is a digital adaptation of the dice game by Dr. Finn. In it you are working as medieval monks to produce illustrations and improve the prestige of your abbey. Manipulate the value of the five different resources, buy and sell at the market, and gain the bishop's favor.

name: Ys X: Nordics
description: Ys X: Nordics is a brand-new adventure set in the northern sea Obelia Bay, featuring young adventurer Adol Christin as the protagonist. Please look forward to this latest title in the Ys series, from the development team that brought you Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of Dana and Ys IX: Monstrum Nox.

name: Shark! Shark!
description: Shark! Shark! is an upcoming action video game developed by NeoBird and Bonus Level Entertainment. It is an updated version of Shark! Shark!, scheduled to be released for the Intellivision Amico.

name: CyberTD
description: Help protect the core of cyberspace from mutant viruses in this innovative tower defense game packed with roguelite elements! Will you be able to build the ultimate line of defense?

name: The War Enders: First Strike
description: The War Enders: First Strike is a bullet hell shooting game. While having 3D graphics, the game keeps a classic taste of this hardcore genre. Select and customize your fighter with interest. Dodge the bullet and strike back the unknown with the determination to save the Earth!

name: My Hero Ultra Rumble
description: Pick your favorite character, team up and fight to be the last ones standing in the new 24-player Battle Royale free to play game "My Hero Ultra Rumble"!

name: Afterdream
description:
Afterdream is a 2D psychological horror adventure game.

Navigate the obscure location populated by ghosts, and collect items to solve puzzles as you move further through the intriguing story. Look through the lens of your strange camera and photograph highlighted objects to interact with them.

name: Wildmender
description: Unearth the past to protect the future. In Wildmender, you face the challenge of restoring the environment. Explore the landscape, revive withering plant life, cultivate your garden, and build a better world alone or with friends in 4-player online co-op.

name: Pizza Possum
description: A game about a very hungry possum causing mayhem in a picturesque beach town.

name: Apsis Online
description: Apsis Online is a minimalist multi-user roguelike (MUR) in which you play a Voyager. A human, mentally and physically augmented for a new life in deep space.

name: Diluvian Ultra
description:
Diluvian Ultra is a single-player, first-person shooter focusing on a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat. The game is set in its own expansive fictive universe. Rather than gritty or dark, Diluvian Ultra is colorful and fantastical, like the cover of pulp sci-fi novels of the past.

Diluvian Ultra: Chapter One includes 10 levels + a hub, 6 different weapons with 30 different upgrades and 13 enemy types.

Further chapters continuing Atilla’s story as well as expanding his arsenal and the roster of enemies to obliterate will be released as paid DLCs at a future date.

name: Infinity Strash: Dragon Quest - The Adventure of Dai
description: The memories of the Hero, in your hands! Experience the story of the legendary anime series, Dragon Quest The Adventure of Dai, in an exhilarating action role-playing game that combines stunning visuals with art from the anime and manga.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Faerie Afterlight
description: Join Kimo and Wispy on their adventure in search of the missing shattered light, Lucentia. Fight or control enemies and turn them into your advantage. Explore hidden/secret areas, solve puzzles, and gain new abilities, all in the vast and beautiful world of Lumina.

name: Lost In Blue 2: Fate's Island
description:
Unravel forsaken island secrets, survive with strategy
Welcome to our island survival and management strategy game!
Embark on a breathtaking journey where you will join other survivors from an enigmatic incident in establishing camps on this mysterious island, navigating the perils of nature and facing off against ominous threats.

name: Paw Patrol Academy
description: PAW Patrol Academy is an early childhood education mobile game based on the popular PAW Patrol franchise. It contains a collection of themed minigames, heroic missions based on episodes of the PAW Patrol television show, and video clips from the show.

name: Zombie State
description: Experience the intensity of a brand-new post-apocalyptic zombie shooter adventure. Step into an infested world and brace yourself for heart-pounding zombie battles!

name: Slime Weapon Master
description: Sin descripción

name: The Crackpet Show: Happy Tree Friends Edition
description: The Crackpet Show is an action-packed rogue-lite shoot'em-up about mutated animals that fight in a bizarre TV show, crushing their opponents with a variety of weapons. Choose your beastie, gear ‘em up, and go kill your enemies in the name of fame and sweet sponsorship deals!

name: Go to Bed
description:
A short horror game about going to bed.
Can you successfully pass each situation?

name: First Encounters
description: Discover mixed reality on Meta Quest 3 with First Encounters. You are on a strange new planet and pesky space puffians are about to flood into your room. Catch as many as you can before time runs out – match colours for a high score!

name: Doctor Who: Time Vortex
description: Can you keep the TARDIS in motion and prevent it from slipping past your defence and out of the time vortex? Use your arrow keys, buttons or swipe to move the paddle.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 06: The Haunting
description:
Prepare for frightening thrills, the shambling undead, squad hunts to take down grotesque monsters, and those infamous jump-scares as The Haunting returns to Call of Duty! The Hellmouth has opened, spilling unearthly creatures from the underworld, and a creeping terror is slowly swallowing all souls as it infects the entirety of Al Mazrah, reaching the bloodred canals of Vondel, and beyond!

It appears a clandestine group known as the Dark Ritual Operators have located and opened a terrifying Hellmouth. After the gate’s seals were ripped apart, a cacophony of otherworldly gurgling resounded, before a veritable panoply of the grotesque poured forth from their opened prison…

All Operators should ready themselves for “Operation Nightmare” and prepare to battle and repel these aberrant threats!

Fortunately, in the ensuing chaos, the Dark Ritual Operators left the gate open in time for backup to arrive in the form of Spawn, the hellacious antihero who is now tasked with sending these monsters and their ilk back to the underworld.

The Haunting event officially begins at mid-season, bringing Halloween-themed maps, modes, events and more across both games. Prepare for spine-chilling scares and ferocious battles ahead at launch with the release of four new Multiplayer maps, a Battle Pass stocked with devilishly entertaining new Operators and Weapon Blueprints, and more.

name: Albedo Carta
description: Albedo Carta is Korean indie 2D RPG game, with a story based on cruel fairy tales.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos - Animal Avalanche Pack
description: Unlock 10 new wild animals in the Animal Avalanche Pack! You’ll find everything from adorable Akitas and pandas to exotic unicorns and sasquatches!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Autumn Bundle Part 1
description: Experience the ultimate autumn adventure with our new Battle Pass, featuring a progression up to 55 levels with exciting rewards!

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - DJMAX Collaboration DLC
description: DJMAX × EZ2ON DJMAX Collaboration is the DLC for EZ2ON REBOOT : R

name: Yay BMO
description: Yay BMO is a collection of 6 maps in total of past ideas and solo maps. Maps are all 5 minutes or under, but are decently challenging so they might take a few attempts.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Variety Pack 2
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 7
description: The seventh season (also known as Stick or Twist) of Love Island: The Game was released on September 27, 2023 with its first volume. A new volume will be released every Wednesday.

name: Paper Beast: Enhanced Edition
description:
Help this unique ecosystem and experience an extraordinary adventure!

Somewhere in the depths of Big Data, a new world has been born. A surreal land where life is just as rich and varied as on our own earth.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Conqueror of Jiangdong
description:
The second DLC, "Conqueror of Jiangdong," follows Sun Ce as he and his forces set out to conquer the territories of Jiangdong after the death of his father, Sun Jian.
This engaging story features new battlefields, weapons, equipment, and demons, in addition to a new Divine Beast, a more challenging difficulty level and an endgame content.

name: Roulette Simulator 2024
description: Roulette Simulator 2024 presents players with the greatest modern Roulette gambling simulation. Experience the highs and the lows in real time as you try to beat the roulette wheel during the intensity of each spin!

name: Lost Princess
description: Play this walking simulation. Collect items and try to find missing Princess in big open world

name: Blood Knuckle: Rooftop of The Impossible Skyscraper
description: Use your giant fist to punch, puzzle and scale your way to the top of a tyrannical skyscraper run by an evil sorcerer to rescue your brother!

name: Little Penguin Chillventure
description: Welcome to "Little Penguin Chillventure" – an exciting journey into the world of adventures! In this game, you'll become a little penguin embarking on a thrilling running adventure.

name: Fastest Cars Traffic Racer
description: Fastest Cars Traffic Racer invites you to endless highways for speed and adventure! Prepare for a real racing experience with four different racing modes and eye-catching graphics.

name: Fast Food Crisis
description: A culinary battleground where iconic fast foods face their greatest threat: an uprising of militant vegetables. you take charge as a sentient pizza slice or a defiant hamburger, and more against these green invaders.

name: Genshin Impact: To the Stars Shining in the Depths
description:
Version 4.1 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Wriothesley and Neuvillette
• New areas: Liffey Region and Fontaine Research Institute
• New main story quests: Chapter IV, Acts III & IV
• New story quests for Wriothesley and Neuvillette
• New main event: Waterborne Poetry
• …and more!

name: Protecting the Base
description: This is a tower defense game, where you can experience the charm of war from the game summary, reasonably prevent turrets, upgrade your turrets, and win victory.

name: Midnight Prowl
description: Midnight Prowl is a horror exploration game set in a Japanese town, where you will experience the horror that takes place there.

name: BastogneBreakout
description: Hex, Counter and Card simlation of the battles around Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge in 1944. You play against yourself or play as Germans against Allied AI. Units are regiments, battalions and kampfgruppen. New Supply procedures make the Germans keep an eye out on the road network.

name: Plum Blossom Divination
description: This is a simulated divination game. Use "Plum Blossom Divination" to help customers divine, learn its contents, experience the fun of divination, and understand the charm of traditional Chinese culture~

name: Lizards Must Die
description: The great exploits of the Ancient Rus in the war with the lizards. Immerse yourself in the world of Hyperborea and defeat hordes of Lizards and other unholy who encroached on holy places Ancestors. Choose a blessed hero and go save the world from the green plague.

name: The Paper Trials
description: A first-person horror maze game. Hiding & Standing still is Death. Run or you are dead. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with your only hope of survival is to find all of the pages to the mysterious book and escape!

name: Betomis
description: Explore dark dungeons as a valiant knight and survive using your wits and limited resources!

name: The Crackpet Show: Happy Tree Friends Edition
description: The Crackpet Show is an action-packed rogue-lite shoot'em-up about mutated animals that fight in a bizarre TV show, crushing their opponents with a variety of weapons. Choose your beastie, gear ‘em up, and go kill your enemies in the name of fame and sweet sponsorship deals!

name: Uprising
description: Grab your bat, lock your shields and light up that molotov: it’s time to take to the streets! Uprising is a brutal modern day riot simulator, where you fight either as police or protestors in a frenzied multiplayer melee/shooter mash-up.

name: Plague Attack the World
description: A game where you roam and defend the world from a plague of mutant flies!

name: Crocogame
description: Crocogame is a fast-paced roguelite game with intense moment-to-moment combat and flexible character customization. Use your resources efficiently to take on increasingly difficult threats. Great challenges also bring great rewards!

name: Scape Run
description: A terrifying Party Royale that will fill you with tension, fear and frenzy, pure adrenaline like you have never experienced before.

name: Paw Patrol: World
description: Explore the world of PAW Patrol like never before and stop Mayor Humdinger’s super blimp mayhem, in a free-roaming 3D adventure full of pup-tastic fun!

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - A.K.I.
description:
A.K.I. is the second DLC character for Street Fighter 6 in the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A poison-wielding apprentice of F.A.N.G, the former Shadaloo officer.
Enchanted by the power of toxins, nothing brings her more joy than testing them on a new target—other than attention from her “master,” that is.

name: Star Farmer: Warlock of the Universe
description:
A relaxing bullet heaven, farming adventure. Play as a powerful Warlock with a side hustle harvesting plants in space.

Build the ultimate space farm as you explore the galaxy and stumble onto the mystery of a dead planet. Cultivate exotic plant life, trade your harvests for credits, and customize your runs with unique powers in this roguelite adventure.

name: Carrot: The First Seed
description: A tiny visual novel about a tiny coastal town.

name: Underground Blossom
description: Underground Blossom is an upcoming adventure game by Rusty Lake. Fulfil various tasks at every station to find the metro that will take you through each important event from Laura Vanderboom's life.

name: Counter-Strike 2
description:
For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.

A free upgrade to CS:GO, Counter-Strike 2 marks the largest technical leap in Counter-Strike’s history. Built on the Source 2 engine, Counter-Strike 2 is modernized with realistic physically-based rendering, state of the art networking, and upgraded Community Workshop tools.

name: Kanji Industry
description: Kanji Industry is an roguelike automatic kanji production game. Players build a production line by arranging machines. The entire game progresses in a deck-building roguelike format. You can get the machine by clearing the stage. Let's enjoy high strategy!

name: Astronimo
description:
Astronimo is an Early Access construction platform puzzler that aims to be the most fun you can have in outer space.

While mining for minerals in the vast reaches of the galaxy, four Hypergiant Inc employees crash-land on a small moon and become hopelessly stranded.

In the hopes of reuniting with their fleet, you must help them to cover every inch of the planetary surface, gather all manner of resources to solve puzzles in unique and creative ways, then build a shuttle and fuel it to launch back into space.

name: Escape From Mystwood Mansion
description: In this first-person puzzle escape room game, you are trapped in the mysterious Mystwood mansion. Explore corridors and find hidden rooms while solving puzzles and deciphering codes to find a way out. Will you escape or linger to uncover the mansion's final secret?

name: Find All 4: Magic
description: Find over 1,000 cute animals and objects in a lot of levels of varying difficulty. The magical black and white world comes alive after coloring. Relax and enjoy playing.

name: The Gray Man
description: The Gray Man is a surreal first-person point-and-click adventure. It tells the story of a serial killer who confronts the player, as the murderer's conscience, with interpretations of his internal conflict.

name: Love of Magic Book 3: The Return
description: Love of Magic is an Urban Fantasy Erotic VN/RPG about discovering your destiny, finding true love and becoming a God. Book 3 is the final part of the trilogy.

name: Danghost
description: Danghost is an arcade puzzle game, inspired by fighting games, in which you play an exorcist who needs to hoover up small ghosts. Make combos, use unique spells and beat your opponents! Playable in single-player, it’s with the local multiplayer mode that the game will reveal all its spice!

name: Hometopia
description: Unleash your inner architect in Hometopia, the ultimate builder's game with limitless customization and high-fidelity graphics. Build your dream home or design entire neighborhoods, solo or with friends, bringing every creative detail to life exactly as you envision.

name: Beneath Oresa
description: Beneath Oresa, a fighting roguelike deckbuilder, takes you deep within the city to confront your foes. As a strategist, choose your cards, upgrades, and artifacts wisely, but as a fighter, turn their positioning to your advantage.

name: Fortune's Run
description: Explore a decaying industrial world left behind in humanity's never-ending race to conquer the stars. Beneath its iron skies, desperate souls kill and steal for passage to the still-plentiful frontier worlds. Sink or swim in this high-octane first-person shooter with stealth and RPG elements.

name: Rehabbers
description: Buy, renovate, design and stage homes to flip for profit or build your own neighborhoods from scratch!

name: Train Sim World 4: Spirit of Steam - Liverpool Lime Street - Crewe
description: Step back in time and discover the soot and sounds of the romantic steam era; climb aboard iconic living locomotives hungry for coal and water, and work hard on busy passenger and freight services through historic Merseyside and Cheshire with Train Sim World 3: Spirit of Steam: Liverpool - Crewe!

name: Train Sim World 4: Peninsula Corridor - San Francisco - San Jose
description: California Dreamin' with the Peninsula Corridor. In serving San Francisco and California's 'Silicon Valley', commuter railroad Caltrain calls at 26 stations and, equipped with Caltrain's F40PH-2CAT diesels and Gallery equipment, it will be your job to keep thousands of daily commuters on time!

name: Train Sim World 4: Clinchfield Railroad - Elkhorn - Dante
description: Experience classic railroading moving heavy coal and manifest freight through the heart of Virginia's coalfields with Train Sim World 2: Clinchfield Railroad. It's your job to take charge of freight services through the rugged Appalachians, utilising the EMD F7 and SD40 diesel locomotives.

name: Train Sim World 4: Cathcart Circle Line - Glasgow - Newton & Neilston
description: Experience the hustle and bustle of a modern suburban network using classic electric traction, link Glasgow's suburbs along the Cathcart Circle Line. Now fully remastered as part of a free update, take in the all-new detail in Train Sim World 4!

name: Apico 3.0: What Lies Beeneath
description: Apico 3.0: What Lies Beeneath invites you to dive into the crystal blue ocean waters surrounding the Apico archipelago and explore its depths. New areas, forageables, quests, and, of course, new bees are yours to discover deep bee-low the watery abyss.

name: Due to Rain
description:
Oh, no! ️
Due to rain, Ribbon and Sarah missed out of their daily walk.
Though, they may have found another way to stay active inside.

name: Downshot
description: Fully physics based multiplayer. Mod Support, Spawnable weapons, blades, tools, props, enemies, and more. Highly optimized for incredible multiplayer sandbox performance. Explore vast and breathtaking levels. Chat with friends over built in voice chat. Versatile weapons with many uses. Experimental gravity and scaling physics!

name: Train Sim World 4: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa Route Add-On
description: Experience complex operations out of the iconic Dresden Hbf, with passengers and freight converging to make a hustle and bustle mix of traffic. Be in control of modern traction and explore the countryside of Train Sim World 4: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa.

name: SpongeBob Adventures: In A Jam
description: Get Ready to go on an Amazing Adventure with SpongeBob and his Friends! Plankton’s latest scheme to steal the secret Krabby Patty Formula has backfired in a big way, leaving the world covered in JellyFish Jam! Now it’s up to you and SpongeBob, along with friends new and old to rebuild and restore order to Bikini Bottom and Beyond!

name: Attack of the Earthlings Mobile
description:
Attack of the Earthlings, the humorous alien strategy game for PC and Consoles, is being reimagined for the mobile platform and has landed on mobiles everywhere.

Command the Swarmers, a highly adaptable and dangerous alien species, against the comically unethical Galactoil Corporation that have invaded your planet for its resources. Survive against the human invaders for as long as possible to prevent the annihilation of your species in this turn-based wave defence.

name: Paintball Playground
description: Paintball Playground VR is Sports/Shooter game where you can compete against other players on SpeedBall, SpeedQB or Woodsball maps.

name: Cortex Chronicles 1: The Trial of Rowan Reed
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghost Of Wynlow
description: An urban explorer ventures out to explore and investigate the legend of the abandoned Wynlow lighthouse.

name: Tsukiweb
description: An unofficial web-based, open-source reimplementation of the 2000 visual novel Tsukihime.

name: Train Sim World 4 Compatible: West Somerset Railway
description: Rolling hills, golden meadows and seaside views await along Britain's longest standard gauge preserved line, the West Somerset Railway. Now fully remastered as part of a free update, operate heritage galas with classic British traction in Train Sim World 4!

name: Train Sim World 4 Compatible: Northeast Corridor - Boston: Providence Route Add-on
description: Experience the fastest rail line in America, from modern suburbia to sprawling countryside, linking the state capitals of Massachusetts and Rhode Island in command of both Amtrak and MBTA Commuter operations with Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor: Boston - Providence, now with volumetric skies!

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition
description:
Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is an open-world RPG containing two powerful adventures: the base game of Cyberpunk 2077, taking place in the dark future of Night City, and Phantom Liberty, a spy-thriller story set in the walled-off district of Dogtown. Players take on the role of V, a cyber-enhanced mercenary, and embark on a fight for survival filled with story-defining decisions, action-packed gameplay, and unforgettable characters, including rockerboy Johnny Silverhand (played by Keanu Reeves) and FIA sleeper agent Solomon Reed (played by Idris Elba).

This new release is the perfect way to experience every story of the dark future; it also contains the free Update 2.0, which overhauled many of the game’s systems, introducing dynamic skill trees, high-octane vehicle combat, and enhanced enemy and police AI — as well as adding new weapons, vehicles, and clothes. The release is bolstered with a set of previously released digital goodies available as part of the “My Rewards” program, available to all who register.

name: Train Sim World 3: Peak Forest Railway - Ambergate - Chinley & Buxton
description: Step back in time and discover a long-lost railway. Re-tread the rails through historical English countryside in the hard-working Fowler 4F. The quaint and waning years of 1960s steam is brought back to life in Train Sim World 3: Peak Forest Railway!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Ultra Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Tugboat Terror
description: A frantic and exciting task-management adventure game where you play as Alessandro, a fish with human legs, and pilot a tugboat through a dangerous swamp of radioactive monsters.

name: Feydome: Fairy Dress Up
description: FEYDOME is a short, almost relaxing game about exploring an abandoned world and finding clothing items to customize a playable fairy... it is part of the DreadXP End of Summer Bone Jam. It was made in slightly less than 14 days.

name: Ape Squad
description:
New war start Aim, Shoot and Throw.
Advanced Military Actions in Modern Combat.

name: Hentai World: Platinum Edition
