description: In this bundle, you will meet student Sayuri and Akane in her new foxy look.

name: Evergarden
description:
A Yume Nikki fangame about nature and people...

Luke Allison is a shut-in.
He has reasons to be stuck in his own room.
Your only choice is to dream and reflect on him.

name: Klabater Bundle: The Amazing American Circus, Moonshine Inc., Heliborne and Crossroads Inn
description: Get a complete pack of games developed by Klabater: The Amazing American Circus, Moonshine Inc, Heliborne, and Crossroads Inn

name: Storyteller: Devilish Update
description: The first update of Storyteller brings the Devil, a new character with new puzzles, a new chapter Genesis with demo version's puzzles reimaginated, a fully-voiced narrator and new levels on existing chapters.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos Bundle
description:
Explore the Amazing World of Anthos!

This special bundle comes with the full game and the Season Pass, which grants access to four DLC packs! The four packs are as follows:

• Visitors From Afar Pack
• Animal Avalanche Pack
• Tool Upgrade & New Interior Designs Pack
• New Crops, Fish, and Recipes Pack

name: Mimi the Cat: Mimi's Scratcher
description:
In Mimi the Cat: Mimi's Scratcher, players join Mimi on her quest to reach her beloved scratching post. The game is a puzzle-based adventure that challenges players to stack boxes and navigate various platforms to help Mimi reach her goal.

As players progress through the game, they will encounter a number of challenges and obstacles, including difficult jumps, tricky boxes, and complex box stacking puzzles. However, with some careful planning and a little strategic thinking, players can help Mimi overcome these challenges and reach her scratching post.

name: Golden Leaf Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: Unlock 16 mesmerizing new puzzles, each capturing the season's splendor in even more vivid detail. From twilight-lit orchards to misty morning meadows, expand your journey and experience the magic of fall like never before. Ready for the next chapter in your autumnal adventure?

name: Golden Leaf Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Unlock 16 mesmerizing new puzzles, each capturing the season's splendor in even more vivid detail. From twilight-lit orchards to misty morning meadows, expand your journey and experience the magic of fall like never before. Ready for the next chapter in your autumnal adventure?

name: Golden Leaf Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Unlock 16 mesmerizing new puzzles, each capturing the season's splendor in even more vivid detail. From twilight-lit orchards to misty morning meadows, expand your journey and experience the magic of fall like never before. Ready for the next chapter in your autumnal adventure?

name: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake DLC
description: Learn more details about the suspicious Loch Ness Hotel to prove or disprove a well-known myth and find out what's really going on there.

name: Star Conflict: Seeress. Weapon of Victory.
description:
This pack includes:
- Active module “Spatial faults generator”
- Weapon “Plasma inductor”
- Unique modifier “Modified tetroxide injector”
- Unique modifier “Modified improved pylons”
- 60 Monocrystals
- A set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.

name: Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot
description: Love can burn like a flame. Can you uncover who's trying to destroy the Osmont family in time?

name: CrankShaft
description: Get ready to experience the captivating journey of a bouncing ball amidst the intricate machinery of a crankshaft. In this game, you'll navigate through the mechanical realm, leaping over obstacles and bounding across the unique landscape of the crankshaft. Test your reflexes and agility as you guide the ball through this dynamic and perilous adventure. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Train Sim World 4: USA Regional Edition
description: Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4 USA Regional Edition - tackle the tough terrain of the Antelope Valley Line, travel between Los Angeles and Lancaster in the Metrolink F125. Experience the hefty power of modern American diesel!

name: Train Sim World 4: UK Regional Edition
description: Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4 UK Regional Edition - express services await on the iconic East Coast Main Line, accelerate between Peterborough and Doncaster in the sleek and flashy LNER Azuma. Feel the thrill of inter-city travel!

name: Train Sim World 4: German Regional Edition
description: Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4 German Regional Edition - Take on the challenges of regional, S-Bahn and freight services on the complex Dresden network, including with the Railpool BR 193 Vectron. State-of-the-art traction at the helm!

name: Train Sim World 4: Austrian Regional Edition
description: Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4 Austrian Regional Edition - uphold ÖBB's sterling service on the picturesque Vorarlberg S-Bahn S1 line aboard the sleek ÖBB 4024. Run between from the island life of Germany to the base of the Austrian Alps.

name: Pizza Panda
description:
Pizza Panda is a fast-paced pizza-delivery platformer for the PICO-8 fantasy console. Players take on the role of a panda who drives a cartoonishly agile car, jumping around small vertically oriented cityscape-style levels in order to collect pizza and deliver it directly into the mouths of various animals who are sticking their heads out of the windows of buildings.

Each level presents the photographs of one or more animals to which the player must deliver the pizza, some of them wearing hats which the player must correctly place upon the animals' heads in order to make a valid delivery. There are also baby rats crawling on the roofs of some buildings which must be collected and delivered to their papa without letting them be eaten by cats. In order to accomplish these things, the player stacks pizzas, hats, and baby rats on the roof of the car and traverses the level, either touching or avoiding certain NPCs. Finding an efficient route through each level is encouraged through the use of a target time; if the player completes all the objectives of a level within the target time, a star is awarded for that level.

name: Firerainbow
description: Firerainbow is a small (9 main maps, 1 underhall and 2 secret maps) MBF21 community project originally hosted in @Meowgi discord server by Petyan. The WAD name has something to do with the award-winning legendary FIREBLU texture but with a twist - FIREBLU has been recolored into a huge variety of colors including a whole rainbow.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Shin-etsu Line (Naoetsu to Niigata) E129-0 series
description: Currently, the Shin-etsu Line operating as JR EAST has three sections: between Takasaki Station and Yokokawa Station, between Shinonoi Station and Nagano Station, and between Naoetsu Station and Niigata Station. This DLC includes the section between Naoetsu Station and Niigata Station.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 2 Cosmetic Collection
description: Nights are long, resources are scarce, and a bitter cold chills to the bone. Here only the ruthless survive. Meet Your Maker's Sector 2 Cosmetic Collection is inspired by the bleeding-edge tech created to survive the Arctic wasteland's frigid extremes.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 2 Arsenal Pack
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 2 Arsenal Pack adds a calculating Custodian and a vicious new guard to your toolbox. Harness the fear and paranoia of the Shattered Peak Sanctuary with the very creations that turned the facility into a blood-splattered nightmare.

name: My new neighbor is a Futa
description: A visual novel about a young woman who was not very happy in her marriage, but her whole life changed when a new neighbor moved in next door

name: ReversiBot
description: The roles of keyboard and mouse will be reversed

name: Golden Leaf Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Unfold the tapestry of the season, from golden forests to festive harvests. With breathtaking artwork and a heartwarming narrative, it's an ode to autumn's splendor in puzzle form.

name: Fright Animatronics 2
description: Fright Animatronics 2 is a first-person horror game where your task is to work in a warehouse for a week. What can go wrong?

name: Polygons Tower Defense
description: Defend this colorful world with a brilliant strategy! Strengthen your battlefield and don't let enemies reach their destination. Make amazing combinations, and choose the most powerful elements wisely!

name: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake - Collector's Edition
description: Follow the footsteps of the Loch Ness monster and reveal the secret of the legendary Loch Ness Lake! Better be careful to avoid being another appetizer for Nessie…

name: Fairy Land
description: "Fairy Land" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy - Latin Power Song Pack
description: Latin Power Song Pack, showcasing electrifying tunes from Latin urban sensations like Yng Lvcas, Tiago PZK, Myke Towers, and more—bringing a fresh wave of Latin hip-hop to the gaming world.

name: Culinary Survivors
description: Food has revolted! Never-ending hordes of ingredients are after you. Fend them off in this casual, action game with a variety of decision making rogue-lite elements that influence your character build against the food army.

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4: Bush Rescue Returns
description: Explore a ripper new side of TY the Tasmanian Tiger with this fair dinkum, comic-style side scrolling adventure!

name: Train Sim World 4: Special Edition
description: Have the ultimate Power of Simulation in your hands with Train Sim World 4 Special Edition. Discover the best Train Sim World has to offer with this bumper pack collection featuring no less than 8 routes, the Railpool Vectron and world-famous Flying Scotsman!

name: Train Sim World 4: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience even more velocity and creativity with Train Sim World 4 Deluxe Edition - featuring 4 routes, the chance to drive the most famous locomotive in the world, Flying Scotsman, and haul heavy freight in the iconic Vectron in Railpool livery!

name: Train Sim World 4
description: Feel the power of simulation in your hands. Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4! Expand your rail hobby and discover the raw emotion of driving a diverse array of iconic routes and trains. From training center to mountain pass, this is your journey.

name: FC Mobile
description: EA Sports FC Mobile is here. Build your Ultimate Team from the world's top players, clubs, and leagues. Challenge your friends head-to-head. Play exciting live events based on real-world football to perfect your lineup. Personalise your team in the all new Locker Room. Take part in the new UEFA Champions League Tournament mode and make history. Join us in building the future of football.

name: Cashier Simulator
description: Have you ever wondered what cashier job feels like ! Here is a simulator game for you to experience that, Sit back, relax and watch some in game TV shows while serving those customers.

name: KoboldKroniken
description: The KoboldKroniken - a unique new world full of exciting adventures. Master the catacombs of Kwertz in the dunegon runner full of puzzles and dangers, collect valuable kokkatts, grow your own umpfs and create your personal goblin avatar.

name: Lil Johnny Goes Home
description: Welcome to the world of Lil Johnny, a thrilling 3D platformer adventure designed by our high school class! Get ready to embark on an extraordinary journey alongside our courageous protagonist, Lil Johnny, as he finds himself in an unknown realm after falling through a mysterious portal.

name: Castle Tintagel
description: Embark on a epic quest of revenge in this nostalgic retro action platformer. Exclusively built for the playdate. Play as Gawain, the last remaining knight of the round table and fight your way through the evil that Morgana has unleashed onto this world. Take down epic bosses with the aid of Merlin and Gwenevere in the fight to reclaim Tintagel Castle from the evil Sorceress Morgana.

name: Pikki Rikki
description: A bun-tastic game for the Playdate!

name: Minecraft: Dungeons & Dragons
description: Experience a dramatic tale unfold with Minecraft's Dungeons & Dragons DLC. Explore iconic locations in the Forgotten Realms like Icewind Dale and Candlekeep, battling Beholders, Mimics, and more. Choose your class, unlock classic spells, and ace ability checks to escape sticky situations. Your story awaits!

name: Goblin Conqueror
description: Kanami, a former Dragon Slayer who lost her job due to the extinction of dragons. Now, she has embraced her new job as a Monster Hunter, wholeheartedly committed to vanquishing goblins.

name: Magecraft
description: Annihilate hordes of mobs and challenging bosses with the ultimate Spell Building system. Infinitely customize your weapons and see how quickly you can break your computer! Abuse the open-ended nature of the spell creation system to destroy the game balance.

name: ReLinked
description: "ReLinked" is a pixelated Sovietpunk action/PRG in which you have to fight back against extraterrestrial intelligence and uncover the mysterious secrets of faraway space.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos
description:
In celebration of the 25th Anniversary of the Harvest Moon franchise, Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos will offer new functions while keeping the core fundamentals that has made the series so popular. The land players will explore is known as Anthos, and is home to the Harvest Sprites, spirits that protect people and nature, as well as the goddess of nature known as the Harvest Goddess.

However, about 20 years ago, an unprecedented eruption in Anthos's volcanic region forced the Harvest Goddess and her Harvest Sprites to use all of their powers to protect the people. The people were saved, but the eruption left the villages cut off from each other... Believing that the separated villages and people would one day be reconnected, the Harvest Goddess sent a bottle into the ocean with a letter and a magic key, then fell into a deep sleep...

name: Train Sim World 2: Northern Trans-Pennine: Manchester - Leeds
description: Towering moors, challenging grades and tight curves are yours to conquer in Train Sim World 2: Northern Trans-Pennine, bringing a bygone era of British Rail roaring back to life.

name: Train Sim World 2: Schnellfahrstrecke Köln-Aachen
description: Experience the thrill of high-speed inter-city German rail as you push the throttle through bustling German Metropolis and the rolling open countryside in the exquisite Train Sim World 2: Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen.

name: Train Sim World 2: Bakerloo Line
description: Experience the hustle and bustle of packed-in commuters, trains every few minutes, the echo of screeching rails in tunnels with the classic Bakerloo Line, rendered in its entirety within Train Sim World!

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
description:
Phantom Liberty is a spy-thriller expansion for the open-world action-adventure RPG Cyberpunk 2077. When the orbital shuttle of the President of the New United States of America is shot down over the deadliest district of Night City, there’s only one person who can save her — you. Become V, a cyberpunk for hire, and dive deep into a tangled web of espionage and political intrigue, unraveling a story that connects the highest echelons of power with the brutal world of black-market mercenaries.

Infiltrate Dogtown, a city-within-a-city run by a trigger-happy militia and ruled by a leader with an iron fist. With the help of NUSA sleeper agent Solomon Reed (Idris Elba) and the support of Johnny Silverhand (Keanu Reeves), unravel a web of shattered loyalties and use your every skill to survive in a fractured world of desperate hustlers, shadowy netrunners, and ruthless mercenaries. Built with the power of next-gen hardware in mind, Phantom Liberty offers brand-new gameplay mechanics, nail-biting courier jobs, gigs, and missions — and a thrilling main quest where freedom and loyalty always come at a price.

name: Pulpergeist
description:
An unmarked letter appears on your desk. A boy has gone missing.

With work having dried up, you decide to take on the case. What you'll soon discover however is a mystery far more ghoulish than you could have imagined.

Pulpergeist is a classic point-and-click adventure game made for Playdate with Pulp. Solve puzzles, escape dangerous traps and enemies, and work to uncover the truth behind the missing child.

name: You Cannot Go Back!
description: A game for Playdate. Test your memory, reach the treasure. Keep moving forwards, for you cannot go back!

name: Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - London Commuter Route
description: Experience one of Britain's busiest main lines, from the nation's Capital to England's oldest coastal destination, via the international hub of Gatwick Airport. Whether Southern commuter or Gatwick Express, a flurry of passengers await in Train Sim World 2: Rush Hour - London Commuter.

name: El Paso, Elsewhere
description: Fight werewolves and vampires in a reality-shifting motel. Dive through barricades to escape the grasp of evil puppets. Destroy the villain you loved. A new, third-person love letter to classic shooters. Neo-noir never looked so good.

name: Paleo Pines
description: Escape to an island populated with welcoming townsfolk and dozens of friendly dinosaurs. Tame them, care for them, run your ranch, and saddle up your trusted steeds for adventures into the wild countryside!

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0
description: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 is a Friendly, Competitive, Team-based Third-Person Shooter inspired from Fast Paced Arena Shooter and modern Class Based Shooter. Using only Water as the main mechanic, Blast away your opponents in various colorful worlds that everyone can enjoy!

name: Mineko's Night Market
description:
Mineko’s Night Market is a narrative-driven, social simulation adventure game that celebrates Japanese culture and invites players to craft whimsical items, eat delicious snacks, and ultimately enjoy all the cats.

Mineko's Night Market is a game that celebrates Japanese culture while introducing a heartwarming story about friendship, tradition, and many, many cats.

name: Mari Is Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Rando'Knights
description: Incremental mobile game centered around collecting 2D knight figurines.

name: Mírame
description:
Jai Bhagwan, a 57-year-old Indian cyclist, spent 10 hours 44 minutes and 5 seconds cycling non-stop. He covered 202.1km. A pathetic figure that a new rider is set to beat, come what may.
Jai Bhagwan wasn't half the cyborg, nor was he half as divorced as the protagonist of this story is.

name: AdoraBullet
description:
Join Rae Stellaris in an epic quest through the cosmos in this cutesy, Game Boy-inspired bullet hell. As the daughter of legendary Lunaheim galactic soldiers who died protecting the planet in a fight against Emperor Quack, Rae’s destiny is to destroy Emperor Quack to avenge her parents and keep her home planet Lunaheim safe.

Rae Stellaris is the daughter of Legendary Lunaheim galactic soldiers who lost their lives in a fight trying to defeat Emperor Quack. Following in her parents' footsteps, Rae trained for four years in the galactic bootcamp and earned the rank of Corporal. After her promotion, Rae is demanded for the mission to defeat Emperor Quack alone. Her superiors knew it was a suicide mission, but due to Rae’s tenacity and determined righteousness, they let her go with the fate of Lunaheim in her hands.

Made for GBJam 11.

name: One, Two, Three Fiancées?!
description:
You’ve been accepted to a prestigious school in the city, but you still need a place to stay. Luckily, your parents have a family friend who lives nearby. She also happens to have three lovely daughters who are all too eager to meet you once you arrive! It seems like a dream come true…

Until you learn you must marry one of them if you wish to keep your free housing! Each girl has her own quirks and struggles, but they all have one thing in common; their desire to know you better. Can you help these three girls navigate through the ups and downs of high school life and show them what a caring partner you can be?

name: Grind Hockey
description: Playdate Hockey Puzzler!

name: Hellen's Gallery
description:
You just entered the gallery made by AIs.
But the guide Hellen is strange to be an AI.
The stories that AI created are also somewhat awkward.

Shall we make our own stories and solve Hellen's mysteries in the four experience zones introduced by Hellen?

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 2 Bundle
description: Experience everything Sector 2: Shattered Peak has to offer. Meet Your Maker's Sector 2 Bundle lets you harness new tools inspired by the frigid Arctic wastes, Shattered Peak's cutting-edge tech, and the paranoiac creations that led to its downfall.

name: Nostalgia 2
description: Nostalgia 2 is a set of 32 limit removing maps for Doom 2. Much like the original the focus is on modern map design slathered with a layer of old school paint, but now expanded on with the CC4 resource pack and new episode themes. It also includes a custom HUD created by me along with a custom monster reskin (featured in the secret maps) created and voiced by BluePineapple72

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Electro Macro
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Shmup Bundle
description: 2 in 1 PolarityFlow Shoot em up Bundle including Steel Rain and Sky Mercenaries

name: Project Adam: AI Attack
description:
2222 AD,
Humanity will suffer destruction due to highly developed AI.

Adam, a special forces agent who survives, wakes up in a laboratory...
That place was the robots' giant space battleship 'Eden'.

Act like AI as much as possible,
Escape Eden from the eyes of AI!

name: Rogue City: Casual Top Down Shooter
description: Fight the mafia on city streets and save your city in this cop action shooter game!

name: Dark Odyssey
description: Dark Odyssey, an epic online rpg game that features idle playing, dungeon challenges, boss fights, character enhancing and customizations. Get ready to embark on a dark and thrilling journey, increase your power, team up with other players and save the world!

name: Xiangqi: The Chinese Chess
description: "Xiangqi—the Chinese chess "Is a strategic and challenging chess game, whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, you can find fun and learn in the game. You can search and download the game in the app store, and start enjoying wonderful chess matches!

name: Cookie Game
description: A casual arcade game concerning a bear named Bottle, the Cookie Game's goal is simple: to consume cookies. However, the missiles raining from the sky appear to be hindering this goal. Thus, you must make Bottle stronger by dodging these missiles and help her achieve her questionable dream.

name: Blackjack Simulator 2024
description: Blackjack Simulator 2024 is a simple, fun, and realistic simulation of blackjack. Battle against the dealer every single round as you try to use the right strategy to win big!

name: Village
description: A young boy has come to a distant village to visit his grandmother. Arriving at the final station, in some wilderness, we find newspaper clippings on the platform. This is where our tangled story begins.

name: Filled to the Limit
description: ​A newspaper ad inspires a girl to become a test subject for a tube-feeding machine, and must reach her full capacity!

name: Asteroids Star Fields
description: It is an awesome space war game. It is a very simple game. Move the spaceship and shoot the asteroids. Try to make the highest score. It is an easy and time killing game. You can play to rest and relax between the big games you play.

name: Up Against Aliens
description: Navigate cosmic debris using time-bending tech in this 3D platformer. Solve puzzles and thwart the alien threat across shifting landscapes. Will you be Earth's unexpected savior when you go Up Against Aliens?

name: Dynaforce
description: "In the classic FPS style, Dynaforce combines tactics and marksmanship. You'll collaborate with your team to devise strategies and take down enemies, participating in intense battles on various maps."

name: Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star - Episode 3
description: Prepare for the climactic finale as Montenegro returns for one last mission. Use your stealth skills to rescue your beloved daughter, Merche, and unravel the trilogy's thrilling conclusion amidst intense action and suspenseful gameplay!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Amusements
description: Puzzles of amusements!

name: Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise
description: Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise is an action adventure that requires timing and precision to defeat powerful foes.

name: Chores of Corruption
description: Chores of Corruption is a top-down arena shooter with roguelike elements where you defeat waves of enemies. Choose between different characters and from a variety of items and traits to create unique builds to survive the ever growing corruption.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Canada
description: Get ready to explore, learn, and be enchanted by the majestic landscapes of Canada.

name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk FPS
description: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk FPS is a brutal, funny, bloody FPS game with an advanced gore system. Featuring 15 beautiful levels, a variety of weapons and a deeply engaging story that follows the journey of a young man and his friend tackling on a criminal underground to give his AI wife a real body.

name: Wasteland of East
description: A Chinese style wasteland pixel style role-playing game. The combat mode is turn based combat chess. Can collect resources to manufacture weapons and props. Play the role of an expatriate comrade performing a mission on the abandoned soil of Huaxia.

name: Russian Village Simulator
description: This is a simulator of life in the Russian countryside, where the player will be engaged in the garden, picking mushrooms and berries, collect firewood, hunting and fishing, brew moonshine and much, much more.

name: Rising Snake: The Present World
description: Rising Snake: The Present World is a semi sandbox horror decryption adventure game. A fictional university campus based on real size. A "Taoist" with special abilities. A twisted and bizarre story. Waiting for your arrival.

name: Alpha Sorcerer
description: An elite sorcerer king with forgotten magical powers mysteriously reappears in a bloody quest for revenge in the supreme action platformer.

name: Cats Hidden in Bali
description: Find 100 cats hiding in Bali in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game

name: Demonologist
description: Demonologist is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with a maximum of 4 people and at least 1 person. Your goal is to detect the evil spirit type in cursed places with your team or alone by using your equipment, and exorcise the entity.

name: Cyber Mission
description: Side-scroller, with beautiful 2D pixel art, addictive shooter gameplay, classic levels and weapons that will let you perform a symphony of destruction of the alien base in the black eye galaxy.

name: Orpheus
description: Revive Orpheus story to save Eurydice

name: Project Planet: Earth Vs. Humanity
description: Will you save your fellow humans, or destroy them as planet Earth? Impossible dilemmas and branching narratives create countless paths through cataclysmic disasters. Work with and against your friends in this 1v5 serious party game.

name: Highway Rampage
description: Rogue drivers pilot a high-octane run over miles of post-apocalyptic terrain, escaping the ruthless grip of the forces that thirst for their blood. Choose your driver and see if you've got what it takes to make it through wasteland highways, dodging, disarming, and destroying your opposition!

name: WitchSpring R
description:
WitchSpring R is a story-based RPG that combines elements of training, collecting, and exploring. It is a remake of the 2015 mobile title WitchSpring.

Outside, you can enjoy collecting magical ingredients, fighting against warriors and monsters, and developing stories with various characters.
At home, you can enjoy training your own witch by scheduling training, and fusing magic ingredients that can be collected from the field.

The witch's ending is enriched by the player's choice and the witch's growth.

name: Tanks, But No Tanks
description: Tanks, But No Tanks is an updated take on a classic top-down arena tank shooter. This multiplayer madhouse will keep you on your toes as you balance collecting coins on each map with shooting projectiles at your foes. Upgrade your tank's weapons, armor, and abilities in between rounds with the coins you pick up.

name: (Dis)assemble
description: Combine characters with unique abilities in this co-op puzzle game! Together they are stronger, but apart they can be in more than one place at the same time...

name: Robodunk
description: Cool robots, sky-high dunks, satisfying tackles and explosive weapons! Replayable single player and coop campaign: buy robots, upgrade their stats and unlock tons of new skills. Choose your path among different opponents, traps and rewards.. Up to 4 players versus where every match is different!

name: Attack of the Karens
description: Attack of the Karens is a roguelite bullet hell shoot 'em up that focuses on difficult multi-phased boss fights, all against the backdrop of the "Karen" meme. Piloting the Manager X-15, embark on a mission to rid the world of evil cyborg Karens and save your city from entitlement forever!

name: LunarLux
description:
LunarLux is filled to the brim with Sci-Fi references, scientific facts, quirky & lovable characters, and a fantastic Moon to explore; filled with technologically advanced Space Colonies and Cities, as well as Ancient Ruins of a civilization long forgotten.

Science and Knowledge...is the ultimate power. Soon, humanity will witness the infinite potential of the universe’s strongest cosmic energy: Antimatter!

Experience thrilling battles with a Hybrid Turn Based x Action Battle System!

Your skills will control the outcome! Shield against Enemy Attacks! Upgrade your skills to deal extra damage! Enhance your experience with 30+ Support Skills.

Master Stacking to perform powerful Lux Combos!

Solve puzzles in secret dungeons, explore a refreshing new RPG world, and battle the Murks that threaten humanity’s survival!

name: Railgunners
description:
Railgunners is a story driven shooter, in a mix of shmup and runner genre.
Fight your way through hundreds of enemy ships, and help humanity fight back against the alien invasion!

name: Relic Hunters Legend
description: Fast. Fluid. Fun. An online cooperative Shooter/Looter/RPG. Gather up to 4 friends, gear up, and save the Galaxy from a terrible villain who has stolen the past!

name: Black Forest
description: Black Forest is a single-player, real-time strategy city builder like no other. Where other games focus on expansion and development, Black Forest is all about defending what's yours. Strategically assign villagers, gather resources, reinforce defenses, and above all, maintain the delicate balance until the king's knights arrive.

name: Eve Online: 20th Anniversary Collector's Edition
description:
EVE 20th Anniversary Collector's Edition Includes:
- Deluxe 8" Megathron Ship Model
- 6" Fedo Plushie
- Megathron Art Print by Lloyd George
- Premium Blueprint Poster
- The New Eden Soundtrack CD
- 20th Anniversary Enamel Pin
- Empire Emblem Pin Set
- Signed Certificate of Authenticity

Digital Content:
- Exclusive Megathron SKIN designed by T'Amber
- Two new exclusive SKINS
- Set of Genolution Implants
- Five SOCT ships
- Metamorphosis BPC - run of 3

name: Shrouded Space
description: After ten long years of solitary confinement on the Empress Xyra's prison planet, you have just been summoned for a special work detail. Could this finally be the opportunity you have been looking for to escape and put all this behind you?

name: Bunny on Rails
description:
The bunny needs help getting to the carrot. Can you build a road to get them there?

Place blocks and get rewarded for making the longest road possible! But be careful, replacing already placed blocks gives you a score penalty!

name: Gnome Runner
description: A simple endless runner game for Sega Mega Drive \ Sega Genesis. You play the role of a gnome who runs towards his fate, despite the obstacles he may face.

name: Yip Quest
description: Fantasy comedy point and click game where you have to play three kobolds who have to steal some treasury.

name: Stranger in Utopia
description:
Teleia: a self-sufficient island separated from the outside world that has seen no poverty, unemployment, or crime in 60 years.

Until now.

When a brutal murder is committed, you, Lieutenant Stevenson, are called from the mainland to investigate. Discover the secrets of the island, find the killer, and their motives! Not everything is as it seems...

name: D-List Diva
description: A free comedy point-and-click adventure game about a misanthropic tour manager and a washed-up singer's rider demands

name: Snook
description: Snoook doesn't end, so please stop playing when it no longer brings you joy.

name: Quoth The Raven
description: Quoth the Raven is the 28th installment of the Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series, created by BluePineapple72. The event ran during June of 2023, in which maps were created in a time limit of 8 hours or less. Mappers were to create Heretic maps using a custom texture pack and calling back to several of the design tropes from the original Heretic. It contains 3 episodes, with forced secret exits, for a total of 27 maps.

name: Zombiezz
description: Step into the undead frenzy of Zombiezz! Experience a one-of-a-kind retro arcade adventure where you obliterate hordes of zombies. With a top-down forced perspective, plunge into action-packed gameplay that pits you against relentless waves of the undead. Can you survive the zombie onslaught and emerge as the ultimate survivor?

name: Academy of Drift
description: Sin descripción

name: Humvee Assault: War 3D FPS
description: Its a 3D war game where player need to defeat all enemies.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Stalemate on Donets
description: Izyum-Barvenkovo offensive operation of the Red Army was carried out from 17 to 27 July, 1943 by forces of South-Western Front in order to encircle and destroy the German group defending Donbass, as well to prevent the transfer of enemy troops to the Kursk region.

name: Testimony of Help
description: "Testimony of Help" is an immersive short film in virtual reality (VR) that tells the heroic story of the Ulm family from Markowa - who provided aid to Jews during World War II. The project transports users to the realities of a village in the Podkarpackie region in the 1940s.

name: Sex Play: Naughty Doctor
description: A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. You play the role of a doctor who cures his patient's sexual problems.

name: Brain Quiz
description: Brain Quiz crazy general quiz game... Challenge your brain, and your culture

name: HBD-RPG
description: Interactive Role-Playing Game (RPG)

name: The Attic
description: A Survival Horror Mystery Explorer

name: SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind
description: You are a Class D personnel on an experimental mission for the Foundation to investigate SCP-479. The facility is linked to anomalies affecting the human psyche, gradually driving them insane. Please remember to take your pills.

name: Osseous and Swordy
description: Osseous And Swordy is a 2D game that tasks players with outlasting an ever-evolving horde of monsters. With the coins falling from each enemy you kill, you can strengthen your sword, your health bar or your shield. Can you reach the last level and finish the game in this hellish game to play?

name: Slaughter: The Lost Outpost
description:
Return to the world of Slaughter, a gloomy place where anarchy and lawlessness reign. Reckless bandits and thugs have broken free from a massive prison, forming gangs and engaging in fierce battles to gain control over the territory.
Our hero - Russell, found himself in the very middle of this chaos and is trying to survive at any cost. He is destined for the fate of a slave if he does not find a way to get out of prison.
Russell has to arm himself and carve his way to freedom. Along the journey, the player, alongside the main character, will discover what is unfolding in this strange place — encountering allies and unraveling the dark secrets concealed within the vast complex's walls.
Fate has tossed you right into the turf of the deadliest and savage thugs. Well, it's too bad for those sorry bastards. Arm yourself, soldier, and rid this hornet's nest. Zero tolerance for those scumbags - there will be enough bullets for everyone.
Explore the vast complex, discover detours, find weapons and upgrade equipment, study documents and diaries that shed light on what is happening around.

name: Sangoku Ziangqi
description: A strategy board game set in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms. Combine various soldiers with generals and command your troops to aim for victory!

name: Influence
description:
Welcome to Influence, a space strategy sandbox MMO set in the asteroid belt of the Adalia system. Adalia is humanity’s new home after an ill-fated journey aboard the Arvad, a multi-generational ship that fled a dying Earth.

Compete with other players through multiple avenues: mining, building, trading, researching, and fighting. Colonize asteroids and exploit their resources, build infrastructure, discover technologies, engage in combat. Expand your influence across the belt, either solo or by collaborating with other players.

name: Mind Benderz X
description: A short, psychedelic first person shooter.

name: Living in a Brothel
description: Live the experience of being a Brothel Manager and train the girls to "serve" the customers in the best way possible.

name: Kanashimi Arabesque
description:
I have a wonderful boyfriend. His name is Yuuki Kiryuu, we just started dating.
He's cool and kind, a boyfriend to be proud of. To know his older brother was the pianist I once admired...

name: ChampionsTCG
description: Play Champions of Otherwordly Magic, a fast-paced and simple turn-based trading card game feature cute and adorable Champions that you can own, buy, sell and trade with other gamers!

name: Why the Wrong Face?
description: A game jam point and click adventure game about disguises and treasure.

name: Deadly Secret Beneath the Dark Wood
description: A forest-themed single level.

name: Super Momotaro Dentetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Sea
description: Captain, it's your time to shine! Rule the seas in Battle Sea – a new version of the classic game 'Battleship'!

name: Puzzle Balls
description: Solve the puzzle to release the blue ball

name: Crazy Bus
description: Fill up the Bus!

name: Ship Wreck
description: Rescue all passengers with your shiny sail boat.

name: Bomb Crossing
description: The monster has captured the maids. Dear brothers, please act urgently! Use bombs as weapons to blow up all the monsters guarding you to save these lovely maids.

name: Mozzies
description: A colourful retro style matching game. Squash Mozzies and match splatter colours before time runs out.

name: Steel Roamer
description: Immerse yourself in Steel Roamer's chilling experience, trapped in an RV, pitted against unimaginable terrors lurking outside. Driving is your only goal.

name: Telluria: Forebodings Gear Minigame
description: Help Annelise open the doors of the water mill (1st Age) or the library (3rd Age) solving visual and textual riddles.

name: Kill The Topulus
description: Kill The Topulus is a simple first person shooter, shoot accurately to survive the attacks of giant rats and become a master of the Topulus by completing all the challenges in each level.

name: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator
description: A new entry of the Atelier series makes it way to mobile and PC! Venture into the lands of Lantana and experience the story of Resna crafted by renowned writer Takahiro. The project is being overseen by Atelier series supervisor, Shinichi Yoshiike, while the character designs have been created by Umiugeso and tokki.

name: Death Rabbit Arena
description: Death Rabbit Arena is a realistic first person and third person shooter that takes place in real world locations. Play with friends online or offline against the computer or by yourself and explore big open world maps.

name: Knights of Dice
description: Knights of Dice is a dice-rolling game, which aims to please gamers that are into boardgames, turnbased games, strategy, and a sprinkle of party-RPG and rougelite.

name: Retro Kart
description: Retro Wreckfest is a fast-paced online race where you can blow your enemies to smithereens to a gorgeous soundtrack that you can add yourself, while enjoying the gorgeous views of the stylized RetroWave tracks

name: Dinoblits
description: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Retooled
description:
Put your combat skills to the test in this fast paced FPS. Resist and rebel against a rogue AI, will you conquer and reclaim or perish?

Forged to challenge your skills in a fast, fluid movement shooter. While facing a rogue AI and hordes of robots in a single player story. Fight in increasingly complex arenas while continuously expanding your arsenal.

name: Alkatria
description: Alkatria is an MMORPG where you play as one of 3 character classes. Explore the secret corners of the continents in search of adventures, make friends, fight dangerous monsters, get unique items and have fun while spending time in the big world!

name: Upload Simulator Silicon
description: Upload Simulator Silicon is an incremental game about uploading, making money, hacking, and ascending as a powerful entity that controls the very laws of the universe using powerful technologies you discover throught your journey.

name: Infinium
description: Sin descripción

name: Mechanic Legends
description:
It’s Mechanic Time! Collect parts and assemble various robots to fight!
The ultimate material, MK-999, can change our future, but the bad monsters have stolen it! Gather all available techniques to fight against monsters, and try to change the future!

name: A Trick and a Treat: Dead Letters (And One Other)
description: A Trick and a Treat is a Halloween visual novel featuring two stories: Dead Letters, a horror story in which a man working at the post office opens a letter and learns of something he shouldn't have; and Vamp Me!, a comedic story in which a woman comes home from a Halloween party to see her roommate in the midst of performing a ritual in their living room.

name: Idle Spiral: Water Pack
description: You will get the Water Spiral as a new design.

name: Pokemon Saiph 2
description: Pokemon FireRed Rom Hack made by Vytron, sequel to Pokemon Saiph.

name: Beggar's Paradise
description: Join the adventure in Beggar's Paradise, the ultimate idle clicker game. Upgrade your items and progress through the levels by tapping and earning money. Build your own economy and watch it grow as you become the richest beggar in the land. Simple, fun and addictive! Beggar's Paradise will keep you entertained for hours. Download now and see for yourself why it's the ultimate time-killer game!

name: The Bunny Graveyard: Chapter 1 - The Bunny Garden
description: The Bunny Garden is the first of 5 chapters planned for the horror adventure game, The Bunny Graveyard.

name: ST World
description: Discover ST World - the next-generation voxel world! Build stunning high-resolution sandbox worlds with easy-to-use tools and AI features. Explore Riftwalkers' open-world adventures and join a thriving community.

name: Hole io: Complete Edition
description: Hole io: Complete Edition features: 9 maps, 40 animated skins, 2 multiplayer modes, Endless mode, Powerups, Collecting themed stickers and easy controls.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Elite Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Expansion pack, Weaponry Upgrade and Target Acquired.

name: Sudoku for Kids
description: Start your journey in the unlimited world of numbers!

name: AirJet Fighter Sky Dominators: Aerial Assault
description: Get ready to dive into the heart-pounding world of high-flying action in "AirJet Fighter Sky Dominators: Aerial Assault" This adrenaline-pumping airjet game combines strategic shooting and explosive chaos, challenging players to become the ultimate

name: Abduction
description: How many Humans can you get to your mothership before getting shot down?

name: Playroom Racer
description:
Small cars, big fun!
Playroom Racer is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.

name: Galaxy Battle
description: Are you ready to become a legend among the stars? The galaxy awaits your command!

name: Cartel Tycoon: Anniversary Edition
description:
About Cartel Tycoon - Anniversary Edition includes:
- Cartel Tycoon
- Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenant Pack - Guerillas DLC
- Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenant Pack - La Familia DLC
- Cartel Tycoon: San Rafaela DLC
- Artbook
- Soundtrack vol.I
- Soundtrack vol.II

name: Dark City: Kyiv - Collector's Edition
description: Gather your courage for a journey into a mysterious world beyond our view in this hidden-object mystery!

name: Train Simulator: Zhengxi Highspeed: Zhengzhou - Sanmenxia Route
description: Experience exhilarating Chinese high-speed rail operations with the Zhengxi passenger line from SimTech Vision for Train simulator.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - Soviet Invasion of Poland
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Silver Moveset
description: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Silver Moveset is a custom mod that adds in Silver the Hedgehog from the Sonic series into Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. The mod adds a completely original moveset for the character, 7 unique costumes, custom UI and new voice clips for the character,

name: Saturnia
description: Doomguy's got swamp ass from going through all the other "-onia"s and needs relief. That's it. That's the story. It is a set of eleven bite-sized vanilla maps using PLUTONIA.WAD.

name: Super Snake Block DX
description: Endless running game, very fun and addictive

name: Cube 2x1
description:
This pack contains two puzzle games that you will have a lot of fun with.

1- Cube Airport
2- Cube Farmer

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour 4
description: Incredibly appetising dishes for every taste! From juicy and colourful fruits to flavourful grilled steaks. And for dessert we will offer sweet culinary masterpieces and, of course, unusual soft drinks and tart coffee without limit!

name: Venatrix
description: Venatrix is a unique hybrid of action-packed and stealth-based horror game.

name: Cuckies & Cream: Maids for Milking
description: Madam, if you have no money won't you sell your body? That's where you and your huge... "wallet" come in! At first they're doing it to pay off their husband's debts, but once these four married maids are hooked on your donations they'll be calling you Master in no time~

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws: Battle of Hürtgen Forest
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Mixed Feelings 2: Elysium
description: Upon meeting Ezra, Zale, and Dandy, you discover that you don't remember who you are, where you came from, or why you're even there. The story unfolds as the residents of the town try and help you remember, and you learn what it truly means to be yourself.

name: Mardori
description: Mardori is a spaceshooter game with aspects of ARPG's. Upgrade your ship with various materials from missions, craft your equipment with damage or defense mods., create new weapons using blueprints, unlock new missions with Stargate.

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman 2: A New Menace
description: Jump, fly, and blast your way through nostalgic gaming.

name: WooLoop: Industry Pack
description: This Industry-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of a different industry in action! Heavy machinery, highly skilled and vital to our day-to-day life!

name: Card Collector And Card Girls
description: Control: Keyboard arrow keys, A button = Z, B button = X This game has no story. You just have to defeat enemies and acquire skill cards to learn skills or acquire items to challenge stronger enemies. Battle is turn-based, Use your skills appropriately. Please have fun with these beauties.

name: Marshmallow Imouto Succubus
description: Tsukikawa Keisuke had a strange dream. That dream involved his younger sister but instead of her usual, innocent self, she had lust in her eyes. So he finds out that a succubus lurks within her! How will he choose between his innocent sister and the allure of a lustful succubus?!

name: Brick on the Head
description: As a manager of an hospital near bankrupt, you find that a brick on the head will give you patients. Also play on Hospital Mode where you can build your own hospital, take care of patients, protect him with security guards...

name: 3D Chess Online
description: 3D Chess Online combines the magical world of chess with a modern and three-dimensional experience! Determine your strategy and fight against your opponents worldwide in this simulator equipped with realistic graphics.

name: The Jumping Food Memory
description:
Embark on an unforgettable card memory adventure!

Dive into the fascinating world of our brand new card memory video game developed by the creators of "The Jumping Food" Games. We proudly present an exciting gameplay with a homage to our Jumping Games and a pinch of challenge that will keep you hooked for a long time.

Each of our three kitchens holds unique levels full of tricky card pairs. Find the right combinations to unlock the next level and put your memory skills to the test.

name: Cosmic Cowabunnies
description: Play as "Sauce," the Grey Alien, on a critical mission to hide alien evidence from humanity. Abduct, rescue, mine, and unravel Earth's mysteries. Battle formidable foes and prove your skills on the intergalactic leaderboard. Prevent disclosure, or the truth is out!

name: BobsleighX
description: You will feel the thrill of speed in the BobsleighX.

name: Hentai Neon Nights
description: Relaxing puzzle game for a good mood

name: Real Boxing: Steel Champions VR
description: Real Boxing: Steel Champions VR offers a casual VR experience where players get to battle others via fearsome robot boxers

name: Laruaville 6
description: Use your Match 3 skills for seeking hidden treasures on an uninhabited island!

name: The World's Hardest Game 3D Nostalgia 2
description: Easy to play, hard to finish. The World's Hardest Game 2, which you used to play on flash game sites, is now with you in 3D! The same 50 levels as in the original game are now here. Be patient, dodge enemies and reach to the end in this 3D Hard Platformer!

name: Evil Snowmen 2
description: Evil Snowmen 2 - This is an improved port of the mobile game with a nice winter atmosphere and evil enemies snowmen. The game is not long, the average passage of the story will take about 30 minutes.

name: Semu
description: Space adventure can be scary, so that's why we at InkForge Studios have developed the most advanced Space Suit ever - the Semu suit. Standing for Survival Extra-vehicular Mobility Unit, it will keep you safe as you journey the cosmos. With survival guaranteed, what else is there to worry about?

name: Redemption?
description: Death came unexpectedly.It's time to understand whether I have lived this life correctly.It's time to finish the story of my life and understand what punishment awaits me for my actions, or were they right?

name: Futanari Girlfriends
description: Futanari girlfriends is a classic puzzle game with addictive mechanics and beautiful sexy girls. Solve puzzles to bring scenes and unlock levels.

name: DeltaBlade 2700 Re:Create
description: Fight your friends as a cyberpunk robot ninja mercenary in DeltaBlade 2700 Re:Create, the remake of the original DeltaBlade 2700. It’s the same high energy, competitive local multiplayer brawler with fast paced sword combat and jetpacks you love, but with tons more features!

name: Mermaid Castle 2
description: Join the mermaid sisters in their new, underwater adventure!

name: Homebound
description: Tasked with finding humanity a new home, a lonely astronaut braves a desolate planet while making a fluffy friend along the way. homebound is a short 2D puzzle platformer that explores the feeling of home.

name: Woodland Town
description: Embark on a cozy journey of discovery and wonder in this enchanting exploration game. Immerse yourself in the lush embrace of a mystical town and the adjacent forest, where hidden objectives await your keen eye!

name: Shrink Assault
description: Shrink Assault is a Sci-Fi game featuring a mix of Infinite Runners and Rail Shooter games. Skilfully control your spaceship to dodge obstacles and shoot enemies.

name: Lucha Masters StickerMania
description:
Lucha Masters StickerMania is an action and platform game, you will play with Lucho, a small axolotl with a big dream, be a Luchador.
Lucho meddles in a new problem, mistakenly releases the god of jokes Mexica, a coyote, the god Huehuecoyotl, who for fun makes a joke: Destroy reality.

You will enter a world of video games and you will visit several cities in Mexico to prevent the Coyote's plan.

You will not be alone in this adventure, you will be able to play with professional Wrestlers such as the Legend Octagon , the Son of Octagon, Coco Rojo Segundo, Dr. Karonte Jr. and many more. Rudos and Técnicos come together to stop this threat.

Face monsters like the Mummies of Guanajuato, the Witch of Catemaco, the Vampire of Guadalajara, La Llorona and many more.

Will you have enough courage to stop a god, become a Luchador and eat many chilaquiles?

Get ready to be a Lucha Master.

name: Bloody Heaven
description: In Bloody Heaven, players will challenge to use various of weapons with different features to beat enemy waves.

name: Divine Shock
description: Swing, smash, and combo your way through the dead. Divine Shock is an infinitely scaling first-person rogue-lite, where you are a Paladin, standing between the dead and the mortal realm.

name: Hot And Lovely: Uniform
description: Hot And Lovely: Uniform is a classic puzzle game. Players need to eliminate more than three blocks of the same type to complete the goal and pass the level. After completing all the levels, the game is successful!

name: Chickado
description: Chickado is an isometric rogue-lite game where you play as an armed chick who seeks revenge against the other animals on the farm by battling them.

name: Hynpytol
description: Hynpytol is a microscopic puzzle adventure with highly-contagious fun. Where Malady held illimitable dominion over all, there was found only one who put forth HAND to seize Malady.

name: Reincarnatio
description: "Reincarnatio" is a village-building card game. Build houses, populate them with people, and work to acquire resources. Construct various facilities to develop and expand the village.

name: Ursine Science
description: A fantasy visual novel featuring intense action at every turn, following the struggles of a bear trapped in the body of a man. Part II of The Enonoia Saga, and the definitive conclusion to Ovine Replica.

name: The Winning Secret of the Newbie Strategist Princess
description: A neighboring country has declared war! The first war in a long time. Due to a shortage of personnel, Estelle, the princess, has taken command of the army. Eh?! "Whoever performs well, can marry the princess as a reward." How can this be!?

name: Succubus's Making Lunch
description: Everyone loves to eat, and succubus is no exception! Our succubus loves to eat and has an inhuman appetite! Help her cook before she eats you!

name: Monster Line of Defense
description: "Monster Line of Defense" is a casual shooting game. Clicking the left mouse button allows the player to fire and shoot the monsters approaching from the front.

name: Tarantula Virus
description: Tarantula Virus is a randomly generated roguelike topdownshooter in a sci-fi style with a lot of items and enemies. Upgrade items unlock new characters find allies and defeat powerful enemies and bosses.

name: Crime Pays
description: Crime Pays is a top-down 2D RPG crime simulator. Take on quests and dangerous encounters in a vast open city. Engage in diverse challenges, access a virtual world through an in-game browser, and master an intuitive inventory system. Arm yourself with a range of firearms and face formidable foes.
